NK090(u)007:1515: sgrub byed kyi yan lag dang /
NK090(u)007:1516: shes byed kyi yan lag gnyis las /
NK090(u)007:1518: shes byed kyi yan lag sngon du bshad na gnyis /
NK090(u)007:1519: shes bya shes par byed pa'i gzhi /
NK090(u)007:1520: tshig dang yi ge'i rgyud dang /
NK090(u)007:1521: rgyud sgo drug /de gtan la 'bebs pa shes byed
NK090(u)007:1522: kyi lde mig gsum tshan gsum gyis ston pa dang
NK090(u)007:1523: / de la'ang gnyis su dbye na /
NK090(u)007:1524: rgyud la'ang byin rlabs brgyud pa'i rgyud dang /
NK090(u)007:1525: lung bstan brgyud pa'i rgyud do //
NK090(u)007:1526: de nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig go //
NK090(u)007:1527: de yang lde mig shin tu rgyas pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig gnyis te /
NK090(u)007:1528: byin brlabs brgyud pa'i bstan pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig rgyas pa dang /
NK090(u)007:1529: lung bstan brgyud pa'i bstan pa gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig gnyis /
NK090(u)007:1531: rgyud kyi zhor la spyod pa'i 'dren sgo gtan la dbab pa ni /
NK090(u)007:1532: rgyud le'u zhe lnga pa na gsal bar bstan /
NK090(u)007:1533: rgyud sgo drug sgo gnyis su bsdus nas gtan la 'bebs pa'i lde mig la gnyis te /
NK090(u)007:1538: rgyud le'u zhe drug pa nas rgyas par bstan /
NK090(u)007:1539: khyad par gyi lde mig ni /
NK090(u)007:1540: 'byed pa'i yan lag drug /dgrol ba'i mdo bzhi /
NK090(u)007:1541: 'byin pa'i rtsa ba de kho na nyid sogs gsum /
NK090(u)007:1542: dang po pa'i lugs gnyis kyi phyi ma ltar 'chad par spro bas /
NK090(u)007:1543: sgo 'byed kyi bsnyen pa btang ba 'di shin tu gal che ba zhig yin pa'i rgyu mtshan /
NK090(u)007:1544: spyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba
NK090(u)007:1545: rdo rje theg pa thams cad kyi bka'i sdud pa
NK090(u)007:1546: po yin cing / bye brag tu rgyud spyi mdo
NK090(u)007:1547: dgongs pa 'dus pa'i gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i
NK090(u)007:1548: po yin cing / skabs nas / phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis lhan cig pa'i 'khor dang /
NK090(u)007:1549: go phyes pa'i 'khor rnams kyi ched du rgyud zhus pa dang /
NK090(u)007:1550: ston pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes lo nyi
NK090(u)007:1551: shu rtsa brgyad na dam pa'i rigs can d+r+wa ma
NK090(u)007:1552: lngas gdung tshig nyer gsum gyis gsol ba btab pa'i
NK090(u)007:1553: ngor gsang ba'i bdag po ri ma la ya'i rtser
NK090(u)007:1555: sngon rgyud byung tshul bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas gdung ba sel ba dang /
NK090(u)007:1556: khyad par du kun dga' bo'am rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po kuny+dza ras zhus pa'i ngor /
NK090(u)007:1557: rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir lung 'di'i smin grol gnyis kyi sgo 'byed pa la /
NK090(u)007:1558: dang po nyid nas gsang ba'i bdag po la bsnyen
NK090(u)007:1559: pa shin tu gal che bas de la bcas kyi
NK090(u)007:1560: shom la rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten tshul
NK090(u)007:1561: gsungs kyang / skabs 'dir 'jug pa bde ba dang /
NK090(u)007:1562: lha sta gon gyi dgongs pa dang 'byor che bas
NK090(u)007:1563: gang du bya ba'i gzhir 'bru'i tshom bu gcig bkod
NK090(u)007:1565: gtso bo dang 'khor gyi lha mo brgyad dang /
NK090(u)007:1566: sgo bzhi bcas pa'i tshom bu bcu gsum bkod nas /
NK090(u)007:1567: de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'das gtor dang mthar chu gnyis sngon 'gro'i nyer spyod kyis bskor /
NK090(u)007:1568: bum pa gnyis ni dbang dang ngan song gnas 'dren dang 'brel ba'i phyir mi dgos shing /
NK090(u)007:1569: gzhan yang rdor dril sogs nye bar mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par byas la /
NK090(u)007:1570: de nas stan bde bar 'dug ste /
NK090(u)007:1572: bla ma dang dpal phyag na rdo rje la sangs
NK090(u)007:1573: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
NK090(u)007:1574: mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs sad pa'i
NK090(u)007:1575: spyan sngar / bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK090(u)007:1576: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK090(u)007:1578: bsdus te byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK090(u)007:1579: bar lan gsum mam gcig brjod pas rgyud dag par byas nas /
NK090(u)007:1580: dzahmh'u bam hohs tshogs zhing rnams rang la bsdu /
NK090(u)007:1581: chos thams cad rang sems kyi snang ba tsam ste /
NK090(u)007:1582: de yang sgyu ma lta bu'o //
NK090(u)007:1583: de'i ngang la dar gcig bzhag /de nas bdag bskyed ni /
NK090(u)007:1584: swa b+h+aa wa shud+d+hahsarba d+harma swa b+h+aa wa shud+d+ho&a hamh
NK090(u)007:1585: zhes brjod pa'i rkyen gyis sgyu mar snang ba de
NK090(u)007:1586: yang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du gyur /
NK090(u)007:1587: stong pa'i ngang las pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
NK090(u)007:1588: gyi steng du h'u las gser gyi rdo rje rtse
NK090(u)007:1589: lnga pa h'u gis mtshan pa de las 'od zer
NK090(u)007:1591: tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las /
NK090(u)007:1592: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag
NK090(u)007:1593: na rdo rje sku mdog sngon po 'bar ba chen
NK090(u)007:1594: po'i 'od zer can zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK090(u)007:1595: zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK090(u)007:1596: dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum /
NK090(u)007:1597: sma ra dang smin ma dmar ser 'bar ba'i dbu
NK090(u)007:1598: skra gyen du 'khyil ba rdo rje'i ba spu can
NK090(u)007:1603: dar sngon pos stod g.yogs shing /
NK090(u)007:1604: stag gi lpags pas sham thabs dkris pa /
NK090(u)007:1605: sbrul gyi rgyan dang rin po che'i cod pan can /
NK090(u)007:1607: g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs kyis me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa /
NK090(u)007:1611: h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes kyi 'khor
NK090(u)007:1612: lo mdun gyi nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs spyan
NK090(u)007:1613: drangs / dzahmh'u bam hohs gnyis su med par bstim /
NK090(u)007:1614: tish+tha badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aas brtan par byas /
NK090(u)007:1615: spyi bo'i gnas lngar h'u tram h+r+ai +aahganasa pa zhu
NK090(u)007:1616: ba las byung ba'i ye shes lnga'i chu rgyun gyis
NK090(u)007:1617: dbang bskur bas mi bskyod pa bdag por gyur pas
NK090(u)007:1619: slar yang gnas gsum gyi yi ge las 'od zer 'phros /
NK090(u)007:1620: rdo rje gsum gyi lha tshogs spyan drangs pa thim pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur /
NK090(u)007:1621: de nas bzlas pa la bab pa na /
NK090(u)007:1622: rang gi srog gi gor rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' /
NK090(u)007:1623: de'i thugs kar rdo rje'i lte bar h'u yig la
NK090(u)007:1624: bzla bya'i sngags phreng gis bskor ba las 'od zer
NK090(u)007:1625: 'phros / khams gsum thams cad snang bar byas /
NK090(u)007:1627: sems can thams cad sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba
NK090(u)007:1628: las rnam par grol te sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
NK090(u)007:1630: n+ai lam+b+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra p+aa ni adz+ny+aa pa ya ti s+w+aa h+aa /
NK090(u)007:1631: zhes 'bum phrag bzhi lang bar bazla'o //
NK090(u)007:1632: de nas las sbyor ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags da
NK090(u)007:1633: ha da ha sarba na raka ga te he tum
NK090(u)007:1634: h'u phata / pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta sogs dang /
NK090(u)007:1635: ma tha ma tha sarba tir ya ka sogs rtsa sngags dang sbrel nas khri gcig bzlas /
NK090(u)007:1636: mjug tu thal mo sbyar te /
NK090(u)007:1637: bcom ldan 'das bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can
NK090(u)007:1638: thams cad sems sdig sgrib nyes ltung gi 'ching ba
NK090(u)007:1639: las rnam par grol bar mdzad du gsol /
NK090(u)007:1640: zhes gsol ba btab nas badz+ra ar+g+ham pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK090(u)007:1642: bstod par 'os pa sogs kyis bstod /
NK090(u)007:1644: ma rnyed sogs kyis nongs pa bshags /
NK090(u)007:1645: badz+ra muhs ye shes pa gshegs /
NK090(u)007:1646: dam tshig gi 'khor lo rang la thim /
NK090(u)007:1647: bdag nyid thugs srog h'u gi n+aa da'i bar bsdu /
NK090(u)007:1648: de yang mi dmigs pa'i dbyings su thim pa'i ngang
NK090(u)007:1649: la mnyam par bzhag /de las skad cig gis slar
NK090(u)007:1650: lang ba'i spyi bor ham yig zhu ba thim pas
NK090(u)007:1651: lus rdo rje'i go chas gtams par bsam la dge
NK090(u)007:1652: ba bsngo ba dang shes pa brjod pas mtha' rgyas
NK090(u)007:1653: par bya'o // 'di ni mdo zur gyi dpe cha
NK090(u)007:1654: 'dzoms dka' ba'i dbang gis ngag 'don dkyus su bkod
NK090(u)007:1655: par bya'o // pa'o // mdun bskyed kyi dgos ched
NK090(u)007:1656: dbang dang gnas 'dren dang rab gnas dang sbyin sreg
NK090(u)007:1657: rnams mdun bskyed kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas bya
NK090(u)007:1658: par bya'o // pa'o // dgos pas / skabs 'dir
NK090(u)007:1659: bsnyen pa btang ba la bdag bskyed kho nas chog
NK090(u)007:1660: par bya'o // pa'o // dgos pas / par sems
NK090(u)007:1661: so // de ltar bsnyen pas phan yon gegs dang
NK090(u)007:1662: par bya'o // pa'o // dgos pas / par sems
NK090(u)007:1663: so // bar chad zhi / lha mnyes pas rgyud
NK090(u)007:1664: par bya'o // pa'o // dgos pas / par sems
NK090(u)007:1665: so // bar chad zhi / byin gyis rlob /
NK090(u)007:1666: dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la slob pa'i snod rung
NK090(u)007:1667: par bya'o // pa'o // dgos pas / par sems
NK090(u)007:1668: so // bar chad zhi / byin gyis rlob /
NK090(u)007:1669: du 'gyur / gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi rten 'brel
NK090(u)007:1672: tshe rabs thams cad du lhag pa'i lhas rjes su 'dzin /
NK090(u)007:1673: rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi las la dbang /
NK090(u)007:1674: smin grol gnyis kyi sgo 'byed cing bskyed rdzogs kyi
NK090(u)007:1675: bsgom pa la dbang ba sogs phan yon dpag tu
NK090(u)007:1676: med pas / las dang po pas sngon du mos
NK090(u)007:1677: sgom dang bsnyen pa bya ba ci nas gal che
NK090(u)007:1679: ngang sgom snga ma drug 'dir bdun phrag gcig legs par bsgom /
NK090(u)007:1680: de dag gis sngon du 'gro ba'i bya ba rnams bstan zin to //
NK090(u)007:1681: da ni bsnyen pa dngos gzhi la 'jug pa la /
NK090(u)007:1683: rtsa rgyud kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang /
NK090(u)007:1684: spyi mdo dgongs pa 'dul ba'i mdo dang /
NK090(u)007:1685: he ru ka 'dus pa'i le'u dgu par gsungs pa rnams gtso bor byas nas /
NK090(u)007:1686: rig 'dzin gong ma rnams kyi phyag bzhes la 'dra min yod par shes te /
NK090(u)007:1687: chos rje dam pa bde bar gshegs pas mdo pa
NK090(u)007:1688: rang gi chos skad ting 'dzin gsum gyi mtshan 'dogs
NK090(u)007:1689: tshul la / dbyings kun tu bzang mo'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK090(u)007:1690: snang ba kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK090(u)007:1691: gnyis su med par sras bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin zhes dang /
NK090(u)007:1692: de dag gi dgos pa dbyings kun tu bzang mo'i
NK090(u)007:1693: ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pas chos kyi sku thob
NK090(u)007:1694: / de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gnyis pas longs sku dang /
NK090(u)007:1696: phyag rgya gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pas
NK090(u)007:1697: ngo bo nyid sku dang phyag rgya spros bcas kyi
NK090(u)007:1698: ting nge 'dzin mthar phyin pas mi 'gyur rdo rje'i
NK090(u)007:1699: sku ste sku lnga lhun grub rdo rje 'chang gi
NK090(u)007:1700: go 'phang thob par gsungs pas sgrub thabs yang zur
NK090(u)007:1701: pa zhig yod nges par rjes su dpags nus kyang
NK090(u)007:1702: / da lta dpe mjal rgyu ma byung bas rdor
NK090(u)007:1703: brag rig 'dzin pad+ma phrin las kyi gsung khams lugs
NK090(u)007:1704: gtso cher snang bas der blta bar bya'o //
NK090(u)007:1705: 'di na smin gling gter chen gyi phyag bzhes he
NK090(u)007:1706: ru ka 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi dgongs pa gtso che
NK090(u)007:1707: bar bzung ba'i sgrub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs nyid
NK090(u)007:1708: rnying phyogs la khyab che bas de'i dbang du byas
NK090(u)007:1709: nas bsnyen pa rgyas par btang ba'i tshul 'chad pa
NK090(u)007:1710: la / thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
NK090(u)007:1711: shes rab rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis kyi dang po
NK090(u)007:1712: la spyir nyin mtshan gyi thun la cha mang po
NK090(u)007:1713: bgos nas thun drug dang brgyad la sogs par phyes
NK090(u)007:1714: na yang / las dang po pa 'jug pa bde ba'i dbang gis nyin thun gnyis /
NK090(u)007:1715: mtshan thun gnyis dang bzhir phyag len mdzad pa nyid legs par sems /
NK090(u)007:1716: de yang snga dro'i thun gyi nang las byang rgyas pa zhig btang /
NK090(u)007:1717: gzhan gsum la sems bskyed dang /
NK090(u)007:1718: lha bskyed gnyis tsam las spyan 'dren man chad sngags tsam dang bstod pa gzhung bzhin btang nas /
NK090(u)007:1719: sems ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa gtso bor byas nas /
NK090(u)007:1720: ting nge 'dzin gyi gsal snang legs par thon pa na gzod bsnyen pa bzla bar gsungs pas /
NK090(u)007:1721: thun gyi sum cha gnyis la ting nge 'dzin bsgom /
NK090(u)007:1723: mtshams ci tsam 'dug pa'i phyed man chad kyi mtshan
NK090(u)007:1724: thun gnyis la rdzogs rim ngang sgom gyi ting nge
NK090(u)007:1725: 'dzin rnams sgom na 'jug pa bde ba'i dbang gis
NK090(u)007:1726: mdo pa rang lugs la ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs
NK090(u)007:1727: pa'i lta ba'i nges pa bskyed nas /
NK090(u)007:1728: de nas bsgom pa la don gyi rjes su 'jug
NK090(u)007:1729: pa mtshan med de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting
NK090(u)007:1730: nge 'dzin dang / yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa
NK090(u)007:1731: mtshan bcas lha'i rnal 'byor sgom pa gnyis kyi dang
NK090(u)007:1732: nge 'dzin dang / po ni / de bzhin nyid
NK090(u)007:1733: kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes de la stong pa nyid
NK090(u)007:1734: kyi ting nge 'dzin mi zer bar de bzhin nyid
NK090(u)007:1737: blos de bzhin du nges pas de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
NK090(u)007:1738: de yang mtsho rgyal gyi phur tika 'bum nag las /
NK090(u)007:1739: las dang po pas yul stong nyid kyi don spyi
NK090(u)007:1740: la slob mos spyir 'dzin pas de la blo bzhag
NK090(u)007:1741: par bya'o // gsungs pas stong nyid kyi mos spyi
NK090(u)007:1742: la dmigs nas gnas par sgrub pa ni 'jig rten
NK090(u)007:1743: pa'i zhi gnas sgom rung du 'gro ba las /
NK090(u)007:1744: lhag mthong bsgom rung du song ba ma yin pas
NK090(u)007:1745: stong nyid la dmigs nas sems gnas par byed pa
NK090(u)007:1746: 'di zhi gnas sgom pa'i tshul yin par shes pa
NK090(u)007:1748: lhag mthong bsgom rung du 'gro ba la bdag med
NK090(u)007:1749: gnyis la dpyad kyin nges pa la 'jog pa zhig
NK090(u)007:1750: dgos pas khyad par gyi rnam dbye phyed pa gces
NK090(u)007:1752: mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral //
NK090(u)007:1753: ma chags chags bral yul las 'das //
NK090(u)007:1754: ci yang mi 'gyur ci ma yin //
NK090(u)007:1755: rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral //
NK090(u)007:1757: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad skye ba med
NK090(u)007:1758: pa'i dbyings ye ji bzhin pa kun tu bzang mo'i
NK090(u)007:1759: mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du gnas
NK090(u)007:1760: pa'o // zhes snang ba sems kyi lung gis gzhal ba'i don la sems ma bcos par 'jog pa'o //
NK090(u)007:1761: 'di dag gi skabs su ting nge 'dzin gyi nyes pa lnga spang /
NK090(u)007:1764: sems gnas pa'i thabs dgus zhi gnas sgrub tshul sgyu
NK090(u)007:1765: 'phrul lam rim gyi dgongs pa bzhin sgyu 'phrul gyi
NK090(u)007:1766: bsnyen yig tu bris pa rnams 'dir blang bar bya'o
NK090(u)007:1767: // snga ma de la brtan pa thob nas nyams lnga mthar phyin pa na /
NK090(u)007:1768: gnyis pa kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK090(u)007:1769: yongs la khyab pa nyi ma'i 'od //
NK090(u)007:1770: snying rje byang chub sems yin te //
NK090(u)007:1771: rnam rtog mun pa sel bar snang //
NK090(u)007:1774: de bzhin nyid ma rtogs pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK090(u)007:1775: sems can rnams la snying rje rig pa'i rtsal snang
NK090(u)007:1776: ye shes kun tu bzang po'i rol pa rang bzhin
NK090(u)007:1777: lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor du snang ba'o //
NK090(u)007:1779: srid pa ye shes kyi lung gis nges pa'i don la sems rtse gcig tu 'jog go //
NK090(u)007:1780: de yang ting nge 'dzin snga ma la nyams lnga
NK090(u)007:1781: mthar phyin pa'i brtan pa thob zin na phyi ma
NK090(u)007:1782: rnams dmigs pa spos nas ting nge 'dzin las rung
NK090(u)007:1783: khyad par can gyi rtsal sbyang ba yin pas bdun
NK090(u)007:1784: phrag re tsam las yun ring mi dgos pa'i khyad
NK090(u)007:1786: de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK090(u)007:1787: a ni chags med yi ge'i mdzod //
NK090(u)007:1788: cho 'phrul rtog pa kun gyi rgyu //
NK090(u)007:1789: nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdog /cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NK090(u)007:1791: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sras bde
NK090(u)007:1792: ba chen po rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil
NK090(u)007:1793: 'khor a dkar po'i rang bzhin du bsam pa'o //
NK090(u)007:1794: zhes brjod nas rol pa 'byung ba'i lung gis nges pa'i don la sems bzhag go //
NK090(u)007:1795: ting nge 'dzin gyi na mo h'u sogs gsum gzi
NK090(u)007:1796: byin bskyed pa yin gsungs kyang 'dir ni smon lam
NK090(u)007:1797: gyi tshul gyis thun bsgom pa'i mjug tu brjod par
NK090(u)007:1798: bya'o // de nas dbyings ye shes gnyis su med
NK090(u)007:1799: pa'i rol par rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal
NK090(u)007:1800: ba blo mchog cig char ba'i gang zag gi rgya
NK090(u)007:1801: mtshor gza' skar shar ba ltar ma 'dres yongs su
NK090(u)007:1802: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
NK090(u)007:1803: su med pa'i rtsal du lam gyis gsal ba yin
NK090(u)007:1804: bya'o // kyang / 'dir ni de ltar bskyed tshul
NK090(u)007:1805: srid mthar ma bkag pa tsam las med pa mdo
NK090(u)007:1806: pa rang lugs chos skad thun min du /
NK090(u)007:1807: 'jug tshul gnyis pa yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa
NK090(u)007:1808: mtshan bcas bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar 'jug pa'i
NK090(u)007:1809: rim pa ni / spyi mdo las /
NK090(u)007:1810: bskyed pa kun gyi rgyu yin phyir //
NK090(u)007:1811: de bzhin nyid ni dang por sgom //
NK090(u)007:1812: gsungs pas mtshon pa'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su
NK090(u)007:1813: med pa'i rtsal rgyu'i yi ge a dkar po de
NK090(u)007:1814: las 'byung ba rim brtsegs ri rab dang bcas pa'i
NK090(u)007:1815: steng zhi ba dang khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rten brten
NK090(u)007:1816: pa dang bcas pa gsal btab nas gtso bor lha
NK090(u)007:1817: snang la bslab pa ci nas gal che bas zhi
NK090(u)007:1818: ba'i gsal snang la bslab pa'i tshul sgyu 'phrul zhi
NK090(u)007:1819: ba'i bsnyen yig las gsal ba ltar nges pa'i steng
NK090(u)007:1820: du 'dir ni khro bo'i gsal snang la bslab pa
NK090(u)007:1822: chos rje dam pa rin po ches //
NK090(u)007:1823: dbyings dang ye shes cho 'phrul las //
NK090(u)007:1825: gsungs pas de ltar na dang po 'og gzhi khro bo dang /
NK090(u)007:1826: de nas steng khang zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa
NK090(u)007:1827: yin nam snyam pa tshig des dngos shugs gnyis kas
NK090(u)007:1828: 'phang pas / de ltar na dang po rtsa ba'i
NK090(u)007:1829: lha la gsal snang bzung ba nas dkyil 'khor yongs
NK090(u)007:1830: rdzogs la gsal snang thon pa'i bar rnams ni /
NK090(u)007:1831: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor sgom tshul yin par
NK090(u)007:1832: lo chen rin po ches rgyu yi a dkar po
NK090(u)007:1833: las 'od zer gyi spro bsdus thugs phyag mtshan rdo
NK090(u)007:1834: rje gnas gyur nas sku yongs su rdzogs pa nas
NK090(u)007:1835: gtso 'khor thams cad ma 'dres bar gsal nus pa'i
NK090(u)007:1836: bar ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i bsgom tshul yin gsungs
NK090(u)007:1837: pas so // da ni dang po gtso bo la
NK090(u)007:1838: sems 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa bslab tshul ni
NK090(u)007:1839: pas so // / gang zag dbang po rab gdod nas dam ye kun rdzob don dam /
NK090(u)007:1843: gsal ba dang stong pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med
NK090(u)007:1844: pa sku gsung thugs lha sngags chos nyid rgyun mi
NK090(u)007:1845: chad pa spyod lam rnam pa bzhi dang mi 'bral
NK090(u)007:1846: bar gnas pa la rim gyis bslab pas spros pa
NK090(u)007:1847: mi dgos kyang / deng sang gi gdul bya las
NK090(u)007:1848: dang po pa phal che ba'i dbang du byas nas
NK090(u)007:1857: dang po lha la sems bzung ba la gsum /
NK090(u)007:1862: bla ma'i man ngag thob nas bla mas slob ma la byin rlabs dang bgegs srung ba byas la /
NK090(u)007:1863: slob ma khams snyoms pa'i dus khams gso ba'i zas bcud can brten no //
NK090(u)007:1864: ston dang dgun lta bu khams dwangs pa'i dus su
NK090(u)007:1865: nyams myong can gyi bla ma'i spyan sngar ram nye
NK090(u)007:1867: de yang rab tu dbang po rno na dmigs rten gzhan med par /
NK090(u)007:1868: thogs mar lha'i dbu nas bzung cha shas so sor rim pas gcig la sems bzung ste /
NK090(u)007:1870: gcig shos sgom pa'am blo che na thog ma nas yongs rdzogs la bzung yang chog ste /
NK090(u)007:1871: thun thung la grangs mang ba khams ma sun bar
NK090(u)007:1872: bsgrims te bsgom pas dbang po rab kyis zhag gsum
NK090(u)007:1873: mam 'bring gis bdun nam bcu gcig /tha mas zla
NK090(u)007:1874: ba gcig gis brtan pa thob par gsungs kyang deng
NK090(u)007:1875: sang de lta bu'i rigs can dkon zhing dbang rtul
NK090(u)007:1876: shas che bas bde ba'i gdan la skyil krung bcas
NK090(u)007:1877: te / mdun du yi dam gyi lha che mchog
NK090(u)007:1878: he ru ka'i sku bris legs pa zhig bkram la
NK090(u)007:1879: mchod pa bshams nas thog mar ci yang mi bsam
NK090(u)007:1880: par mi rtog pa'i ngang la cung zad mnyam par
NK090(u)007:1881: bzhag /de nas thang sku de'i dbu nas mar zhabs
NK090(u)007:1883: zhabs nas dbu'i bar yas rim gyis blta /
NK090(u)007:1884: yang sku ril po spyi khyab tu blta /
NK090(u)007:1885: skabs su mi rtog par bzhag ste ngal gso /
NK090(u)007:1886: de ltar yang yang byas pas nyin gcig 'khyong par bya /
NK090(u)007:1887: de'i nub mo gnyid tshim par log /nam langs nas sngar bzhin bsgom /
NK090(u)007:1888: nub mo lha mi bsgom par mi rtog par bzhag
NK090(u)007:1889: /de ltar byas pas ma bsgom pa'i dus su yang
NK090(u)007:1890: / yid la lha sku bkra lam gyis 'byung ste /
NK090(u)007:1891: de byung na dmigs rten de med par yid yul du sgom /
NK090(u)007:1892: gal te ma byung na sku la sems bsgrims te
NK090(u)007:1893: bltas rjes mig btsum la lha'i sku sngar ltar e
NK090(u)007:1894: gsal lta / de yang mog mog por mi gsal
NK090(u)007:1895: na yang mig phyes te sku la bltas la gsal
NK090(u)007:1896: gsal lta / btab ste / rnam pa wa le
NK090(u)007:1897: gsal ba la rnam rtog gi 'gyu ba bcad la
NK090(u)007:1899: de yang blo shin tu chung na thog mar bris sku'o //
NK090(u)007:1900: 'bur sku lder bzo lta bu gdos bcas kyi sku'i
NK090(u)007:1901: rnam pa 'dra ba las ma shar yang de ka
NK090(u)007:1902: la bsgom / de goms nas dwangs gsal sgrib thogs med pa 'ja' tshon lta bu dang /
NK090(u)007:1903: de yang snang tsam las ngo bo la lta dus ngos bzung med pa sgyu ma lta bur sbyang /
NK090(u)007:1904: blo che na dang po nas gzugs brnyan lta bu snang stong gnyis med du bsgom par bya ste /
NK090(u)007:1905: sa bcad dang po lha gsal bar bya ba bstan /
NK090(u)007:1906: gnyis pa brtan par bya ba ni /
NK090(u)007:1907: sgom nyams lnga dang sbyar dgos te /
NK090(u)007:1912: mthar phyin pa'i nyams dang lnga'o //
NK090(u)007:1913: de la dang po g.yo ba'i nyams ni /
NK090(u)007:1914: de ltar sgom pa'i tshe sems mi gnas par rnam
NK090(u)007:1915: rtog mang du 'gyu 'phro byed pa sngar las rnam
NK090(u)007:1916: rtog mang du song ba lta bu rnam rtog 'phro
NK090(u)007:1917: mi chod par gcig rjes gcig non du skye ba
NK090(u)007:1918: 'byung ste / sngar rnam rtog ngos ma zin par
NK090(u)007:1919: tha mal par shor bas dgra ngo mi shes pa
NK090(u)007:1920: 'byung ste / lta bu la / 'dir dgra ngos
NK090(u)007:1921: zin pa lta bu'i sems cung zad gnas shing zin
NK090(u)007:1922: par nye ba ri gzar gyi 'bab chu lta bu
NK090(u)007:1923: ste g.yo ba'i nyams zhes bya'o //
NK090(u)007:1924: de nas sgrim lhod spel ma rgyun 'thud de 'bad
NK090(u)007:1925: nas bsgom pas rnam rtog je nyung du song ba'i
NK090(u)007:1926: rtags su lha sku'i dbyibs dang sku mdog gnyis dus
NK090(u)007:1927: gcig sems la wal wal 'char na gsal zhing brtan
NK090(u)007:1928: pa thob pa rdzing gi chu 'khyil ba lta bu
NK090(u)007:1929: ste thob pa'i nyams zhes bya'o //
NK090(u)007:1930: de nas kyang bsgom pas lha sku yid la 'char
NK090(u)007:1931: ba de gyang logs sam ri rtse dang re lde
NK090(u)007:1932: lta bu thag ring thung gang du bsgom kyang khyad
NK090(u)007:1933: med par gsal thebs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:1934: yun kyang thun gyi sum cha'am thun phyed tsam du
NK090(u)007:1935: rnam rtog rags pa mi 'gyu bar gnas thub na
NK090(u)007:1936: chu klung ste / rgyun chu dal gyis 'bab pa lta bu de goms pa'i nyams zhes bya'o //
NK090(u)007:1937: de nas yang bsgom pas lha'i sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs /
NK090(u)007:1938: rags pa thams cad wa ler gsal gyi rnam rtog
NK090(u)007:1939: gzhan gyis bskyod mi nus par thun re re tsam
NK090(u)007:1940: 'byong par 'byung ba ni brtan pa'i nyams zhes bya'o
NK090(u)007:1941: // dpe rgya mtsho rlabs dang bral ba'am ri rab lta bu'o //
NK090(u)007:1942: da dung yang bsgom pas mthar lha'i spyan gyi dkar
NK090(u)007:1943: nag rdzi ma ba spu yan chad dngos su mthong
NK090(u)007:1944: rgyu dang rig rgyu yod pa ltar gsal ba dang
NK090(u)007:1945: / de yang nyin mtshan nam 'dod kyi bar 'phyongs
NK090(u)007:1946: pa ni mthar phyin pa'i nyams te gzhan du rig
NK090(u)007:1947: mthong gi mtshan ma rnyed pa zhes bshad pa de
NK090(u)007:1948: / yin no // de yang lha sku mi gsal
NK090(u)007:1949: ba'i dus su de ka'i 'phro la u tshug gis
NK090(u)007:1950: rgyun ring skyong na khams 'khrugs shing sna sun te
NK090(u)007:1951: slar sgom snying mi 'dod pa 'byung zhing phyin chad
NK090(u)007:1952: sgom la bogs skyed mi 'byung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:1953: slar rnam rtog 'phro rkyen byed pas /
NK090(u)007:1954: spyir thun thung la grangs mang ba dang /
NK090(u)007:1955: lha sku gsal go ba'i sgang la 'phro bcad de
NK090(u)007:1956: bzhag /yang sgom pas slar de sgom snying 'dod pa
NK090(u)007:1957: 'byung / thun mtshams rgyun mi ring ba de ma
NK090(u)007:1958: thag yang sgom la 'jug /de yang mtshan mo lta
NK090(u)007:1959: bu gnyid sad ma thag gi gnyid kyi bzi ma
NK090(u)007:1960: dwangs pa za zi nyag nyog gi skabs dang /
NK090(u)007:1961: nyin par lto 'grang che ba dang bzi ba sogs kyi khams nyog pa'i dus dang /
NK090(u)007:1963: gnas khang dkar rib nag rib tu mi bsgom /
NK090(u)007:1964: bdag gi bla ma bka' drin can gyis /
NK090(u)007:1965: rgya rong dgon par khong gis smin gling rdor sems
NK090(u)007:1966: kyi bsnyen pa btang dus lha bsgom pa la sku
NK090(u)007:1967: phyed la gsal snang legs po thon /
NK090(u)007:1968: sku phyed de mog mog zhig las gsal mi thebs pa zhig byung na /
NK090(u)007:1969: de skar khung gi phyed kyi grib ma sku lus la phog pas len /
NK090(u)007:1970: bskyed rim 'di gnas khang gsal cha che sa na sgom dgos gsungs so //
NK090(u)007:1971: des na nyin mo nyi ma dwangs gsal ba nam mkha' dwangs pa'i dus dang /
NK090(u)007:1972: mtshan mo mar me 'od yod sogs su sgom na bying 'thib mi 'byung ba'i dgos pa che /
NK090(u)007:1973: mtshan mo gnyid bcag na nyin par khams nyog ste
NK090(u)007:1974: sgom pa gnad du mi 'gro bas nyal dus gnyid
NK090(u)007:1975: tshim par log /nyin mo yang thun thung brgyad tsam
NK090(u)007:1976: du bsgos te sgom na gnad du 'gro /
NK090(u)007:1977: thun 'jog dus btsan thabs su 'phro bcad de har
NK090(u)007:1978: langs byas na sgom 'chor bas dal bus sgom gsal
NK090(u)007:1979: ba rang gi sgang la gsal snang de ma shor
NK090(u)007:1980: bar byas la / thun mtshams la 'jug gsal btab ma thag wal gyis yong na /
NK090(u)007:1982: srod dang tho rangs la bsgom pas chog /spyir bsgom gyi sna ma sun cing /
NK090(u)007:1983: yid ma 'gras tsam du lha sku'i cha shas yid la gang gsal ba gcig la sems gtad la /
NK090(u)007:1984: de brtan na sku rdzogs par gsal ba la bslab ste brtan par bya dgos so //
NK090(u)007:1985: gsum pa yun bsring bar bya ba ni /
NK090(u)007:1986: de ltar gsal zhing cung zad brtan pa sgom pa'i
NK090(u)007:1987: thun tshod nyin thun gnyis dang mtshan thun gnyis khrigs
NK090(u)007:1988: chags su gcod pa gal che ste /
NK090(u)007:1989: phyis thun tshod nyin mo yin na thur shing gi
NK090(u)007:1990: grib ma lta bus nyi grib gzhal te grangs rtsi
NK090(u)007:1991: / mtshan mo lta bur nang gi thun tshod dbugs
NK090(u)007:1992: rgyu ba'i grangs kyis bzung ste thun tshod re la
NK090(u)007:1993: dbugs phar btang tshur rngub kyi khug pa bdun stong
NK090(u)007:1994: nyis brgya re 'byung zhing nyin zhag phrug re la
NK090(u)007:1995: thun tshod brgyad re 'byung bas nam zla dus bzhi'i
NK090(u)007:1996: dbang gis nyin mtshan ring thung la dpags te nyin
NK090(u)007:1997: bzhi dang mtshan bzhir bgos te tshad la phebs te
NK090(u)007:2001: de la yun ring gnas par 'gyur /
NK090(u)007:2002: grangs kyang ngag gis mi 'dren par yid kyis phreng ba la bsgrang /
NK090(u)007:2003: thun tshod brgyad pa'ang gnyis gnyis su bcad de /
NK090(u)007:2004: thun chung bcu drug tu bgos la nyin mo grib tshod kyis gzhal te /
NK090(u)007:2005: grib tshod re re la sgom /
NK090(u)007:2007: de ltar na thun brgyad la bsgom /
NK090(u)007:2008: brgyad la ngal gso ba spel mar bya /
NK090(u)007:2009: de la brtan na thun chung gnyis bsreng ste bsgom /
NK090(u)007:2010: de nas rim gyis nyi ma re dang /
NK090(u)007:2012: zla ba phyed la sogs par bsgom nus pa 'byung /
NK090(u)007:2013: mdor na thun ring thung ji ltar yang /
NK090(u)007:2015: lha sku gsal la mi rtog pa de'i ngang la
NK090(u)007:2016: yun bgas kyis bsring ste lha gsal ba yun ring
NK090(u)007:2017: bar bya'o // de yan chad ni don tshan dang po lha gsal bar bya ba'i thabs so //
NK090(u)007:2018: rtsa ba'i gnyis pa 'gyur ba'i skyon bcos pa la gnyis te /
NK090(u)007:2021: skyon ngos bzung ba la gnyis /
NK090(u)007:2023: khyad par gyi skyon bcos pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2025: dmigs pa brjed nges zhes pa bsgom rgyu'i dmigs pa
NK090(u)007:2026: gang yin 'phral 'phral brjed de sgom dus sgom lugs
NK090(u)007:2028: le lo zhes pa snyoms las dang rgyu ngan gyis
NK090(u)007:2029: slar byas chog snyam zhing phyi bshol du bzhag ste
NK090(u)007:2031: dogs pa zhes pa sgom kyang gsal po ma byung
NK090(u)007:2032: gi dogs pas the tshom zos nas mi sgom pa
NK090(u)007:2033: dang / bying ba zhes pa rang bzhin shugs kyis
NK090(u)007:2034: rkyen la ma ltos par shes pa gsal cha med
NK090(u)007:2035: par bying rmugs su shor ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2036: kha zas dang gos dang gnas mal dang /
NK090(u)007:2037: grogs grib can sogs grib skyon gyis bying ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2038: rgod pa zhes pa rnam rtog 'phro rgod sna tshogs
NK090(u)007:2039: kyi rkyen med par rang bzhin du shar ba dang
NK090(u)007:2040: / ched du ma bcos kyang rkyen gyis 'phro ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2041: ched gtad kyis bcos te rnam rtog 'phror bcug pa lta bu dang /
NK090(u)007:2042: rtsol ba zhes pa lha gsal zhing sems gnas bzhin
NK090(u)007:2043: du da dung ha cang de bas gsal zhing gnas
NK090(u)007:2044: pa zhig 'dod de rig pa gcun che bas dmigs
NK090(u)007:2045: pa de ban bun du song ste rlung ldang ste
NK090(u)007:2047: mi rtsol ba zhes pa sgom la chog shes byas te mi sgom pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2048: bying rgod sogs byung dus de 'gogs pa'i gnyen po la rtsol ba mi byed pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2049: 'di dag ni thun mong ba'i gzhung las ting nge
NK090(u)007:2050: 'dzin sgom pa'i gegs nyes pa lnga zhes gsungs pa
NK090(u)007:2051: dang / 'dir bstan pa gnyis dbye bsdus khyad par tsam ma gtogs don 'dra'o //
NK090(u)007:2052: gnyis pa khyad par gyi skyon ni bcu gnyis te /
NK090(u)007:2053: lha sku mi gsal ba rab rib byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2054: mog mog po dang grib ma phog pa lta bu bkrag mdangs mi gsal ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2055: sku chen po sgom dus chung ngur 'gyur ba sogs sku tshad 'gyur ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2056: rgyan can sgom dus rgyan med du 'char ba lta bu cha lugs 'gyur ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2057: zhal ras mi'i gdong brnyan du sgom pa dud 'gro'i
NK090(u)007:2058: gdong du 'gyur ba lta bu dbyibs 'gyur ba dang
NK090(u)007:2059: / lha gcig bsgom dus gnyis su 'gyur ba lta bu grangs 'gyur ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2060: thog mar bzhugs par bsgom pa yang bzhengs par song ba lta bu bzhugs tshul 'gyur ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2061: che mchog lta bu bsgom na sngon po'i kha dog
NK090(u)007:2062: tsam las sku'i bzo dbyibs med pa kha dog 'ba'
NK090(u)007:2064: sku'i dbyibs shar yang kha dog sgom pa ltar mi 'char bar dbyibs 'ba' zhig snang ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2065: thog mar gsal yang de ma thag rim gyis mi gsal bar 'gro ba rim par nub pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2066: rgyan cha lugs phyag mtshan sku'i cha shas sogs ma
NK090(u)007:2067: tshang bar 'char ba ni ma rdzogs pa ste bcu
NK090(u)007:2068: gnyis so // gnyis pa skyon de rnams bcos pa la gnyis /
NK090(u)007:2069: spyi'i skyon bdun gyi log gnon gyi gnyen po ni
NK090(u)007:2070: spang ba'i 'du shes brgyad brten pa yin te 'di
NK090(u)007:2071: dang thun mong gi gzhung las 'byung ba gnyis ka
NK090(u)007:2073: de yang dmigs pa brjed nges pa'i gnyen por dmigs
NK090(u)007:2074: pa de la thog mar yun ring du 'dres par
NK090(u)007:2075: byas rjes de ma thag ma brjed par bya'o snyam
NK090(u)007:2077: le lo'i gnyen po ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i phan yon dang /
NK090(u)007:2078: sems dang ba'i dad pa dang de sgrub pa la 'dun pa'i 'dun pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2079: phan yon mthong bas spro shugs bskyed de rtsol ba'i brtson 'grus rnams bsgom mo //
NK090(u)007:2080: dogs pa'i gnyen por rtogs pa'i dpa' gdeng bskyed de the tshom med pa'i nges shes brten /
NK090(u)007:2081: bying ba'i gnyen por sems spro shi ba bsal te
NK090(u)007:2082: dmigs pa la shes pa'i 'dzin stang gi ngar cha
NK090(u)007:2083: thon pa dang / shes pa gzengs bstod /
NK090(u)007:2084: spyod lam khrus bya zhing rtsol bcag bya /
NK090(u)007:2087: snang ba g.yel che sar sdod /
NK090(u)007:2088: rgod pa'i gnyen por 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs bsgom la skyo shas dang nges 'byung gi blo bskyed /
NK090(u)007:2089: sems dran pa'i thag pas bcings te dmigs pa'i sdong
NK090(u)007:2090: po la btags zhes yengs su mi 'jug par dran
NK090(u)007:2091: pas bzung zhing dmigs pa la yang yang gcur /
NK090(u)007:2092: bying rgod gnyis ka ma byung gong nas byung ma byung tshor ba'i shes bzhin gyi bya ra brten /
NK090(u)007:2093: rtsol ba'i gnyen por 'du byed btang snyoms zhes pa /
NK090(u)007:2094: rtsol ba lhod de rang babs su bzhag mi rtsol
NK090(u)007:2095: ba'i gnyen por brtson 'grus brten te gnyen po gsal
NK090(u)007:2096: gdab dgos so // des na ting nge 'dzin sgom
NK090(u)007:2097: pa'i gong 'og gi dmigs rnam rnams dang po nyid
NK090(u)007:2098: nas blo thog nas byang nges par yid la 'jags
NK090(u)007:2099: gdab dgos so // par bzung / sgom na gzod
NK090(u)007:2100: sgom shes pa zhig 'ong bas ched du bris pa'o
NK090(u)007:2101: gdab dgos so // par bzung / // gnyis pa khyad par gyi skyon bcos pa la /
NK090(u)007:2102: rab rib mog mog grib ma ltar snang ba gsum
NK090(u)007:2103: la stong nyid mi rtog pa sgom zhing sgo gsum
NK090(u)007:2104: ma bcos par g.yo med du ci gnas bzhag rjes
NK090(u)007:2105: bris sku la zhib tu bltas la sgom /
NK090(u)007:2106: yang mi rtog par sgom pa gnyis spel mar bya ste /
NK090(u)007:2108: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku lus las //
NK090(u)007:2109: 'od kyis 'jig rten snang bar byed pa yi //
NK090(u)007:2110: mgon po gang gi sku la sems 'dzin pas //
NK090(u)007:2111: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mnyam bzhag yin //
NK090(u)007:2113: skabs 'dir bshad dgos pa mang yang re zhig spros pa bskyung ngo //
NK090(u)007:2114: sku tshad dang cha lugs bzhugs tshul 'gyur ldog byed
NK090(u)007:2115: pa bzhi ni gnyen por lha sku de gdos bcas
NK090(u)007:2116: 'jim sku lta bur lder bzo shin tu che ba
NK090(u)007:2117: / shangs kyi bu ga'i nang du phug ron 'tshangs
NK090(u)007:2118: te phar 'gro tshur 'gro byed pa phyag zhabs sogs
NK090(u)007:2119: la bya dang byi'u babs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2120: ri dwags dang ra lug sogs kyis brdung kha tshod pa rtsed mo byed pa /
NK090(u)007:2121: sku'i cha la bya brun dang /
NK090(u)007:2122: bag zon zhes pa skyes ral le ba zhig tu sgom /
NK090(u)007:2124: dang po nyid nas gcig gam gnyis sam grangs su bcad pa ltar sgom /
NK090(u)007:2125: kha dog 'ba' zhig shar ba la /
NK090(u)007:2126: de bzhag la dbyibs kyi rnam pa yang yang gsal gdab /
NK090(u)007:2127: 'ga' zhig la rang gi lus khams la khrag mkhris
NK090(u)007:2128: sogs nad khams shas che chung gi dbang gis khrag
NK090(u)007:2129: shas che ba la dmar po dang /
NK090(u)007:2130: mkhris shas che ba la ser po rkyang pa 'char
NK090(u)007:2131: ba lta bu 'ong srid pas nad kyi 'phrul yin
NK090(u)007:2132: min brtags la nad bcos bya /
NK090(u)007:2133: rim pas nub pa la lha sku'i dbu zhal nas
NK090(u)007:2134: phyag zhabs lta bu sku'i cha shas gtso che ba
NK090(u)007:2135: rnams / yang yang nges nges su gsal btab la gzod sgom gyi khog bsrang /
NK090(u)007:2136: ma rdzogs pa'i skyon la lha'i sku la bltas /
NK090(u)007:2137: yang rdzogs wal gyis yang yang sgom la 'bad /
NK090(u)007:2138: yang na cha shas gang ma rdzogs pa de kho
NK090(u)007:2139: na la dmigs phug ste yang yang gsal 'debs te
NK090(u)007:2140: bsgom mo // don gsum pa lha dbral ba ni /
NK090(u)007:2141: de ltar skyon de dag ma sel gyi bar du
NK090(u)007:2142: mi rtog pa sgom pas shes pa thang chad pa
NK090(u)007:2143: dang / ngal sos shing sems dwangs snyigs phye nas /
NK090(u)007:2144: lha gsal bar 'gyur bas lha dang mi rtog pa spel mar sgom par bya ste /
NK090(u)007:2146: chos kun ma 'dres yongs rdzogs par //
NK090(u)007:2147: ji bzhin ngang du ye gnas pa //
NK090(u)007:2148: shes par bya ba'i rgyud don yin //
NK090(u)007:2150: de yang lha skyon med du gsal thebs nas de'i
NK090(u)007:2151: ched du mi rtog pa sgom mi dgos pa lha
NK090(u)007:2152: kho na sgom ste lha mi rtog pa dang dbral
NK090(u)007:2153: ba zhes bya'o // don bzhi pa lha lam du bslab pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2154: de ltar lha'i sku skyon dang bral bar gsal thebs na lha de res 'ga' bzhengs par sgom /
NK090(u)007:2158: de bzhin du gan rkyal dang /
NK090(u)007:2161: nye ba ri bo'i khong gseng /
NK090(u)007:2164: chu'i gting sogs gang du sgom mam ji ltar sgom
NK090(u)007:2165: kyang skyon med du gsal zhing mi bde ba med
NK090(u)007:2166: na lha lam du slong ba yin no //
NK090(u)007:2167: don tshan lnga pa lha bsre ba'am lha dang rang rgyud bsre ba zhes bya ba ni /
NK090(u)007:2168: 'di yan chad kyi dmigs pa de rnams /
NK090(u)007:2169: lha'i snang ba la goms su gzhug cing byang chub pa'i mdun bskyed kyi tshul du bsgom kyang /
NK090(u)007:2170: de mdun bskyed dngos ma yin te /
NK090(u)007:2171: ting nge 'dzin la goms pa lob pa'i tshad yin la /
NK090(u)007:2172: mdun bskyed ni bdag nyid lhar gsal ba'i mdun du
NK090(u)007:2173: dag pa mngon gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yin
NK090(u)007:2174: no // 'dir ni de nas lha lam du slong
NK090(u)007:2175: shing byang bar gyur pa de mdun du gsal btab
NK090(u)007:2176: no // ste / de rang la bstim pas rang
NK090(u)007:2177: nyid de dang mtshungs pa'i lha sku yongs rdzogs gsal
NK090(u)007:2178: la ma 'dres par gyur par bsgom ste /
NK090(u)007:2179: gtso rkyang ngam 'khor can gzhal yas khang dang bcas
NK090(u)007:2180: pa sogs gang mos su gsal gdab pa yang yang
NK090(u)007:2181: bya ste / sngon ma la goms pa des 'dir
NK090(u)007:2182: dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yang dkyus las bstan pa thams
NK090(u)007:2183: cad bsgom na las slar bar 'gyur ro //
NK090(u)007:2184: rtsa ba'i drug pa lha don la sbyar ba ni /
NK090(u)007:2185: bdag gi rnam rtog gi rtsol bas bskyed pa'i bdag
NK090(u)007:2186: don snang ba'i nga rgyal lha'i skur bsgom pa de
NK090(u)007:2187: gsal zhing brtan par gyur na /
NK090(u)007:2188: de nyid gdos bcas lta bu ma yin par chu nang gi zla gzugs sam /
NK090(u)007:2189: bar snang gi 'ja' tshon lta bu snang la rang
NK090(u)007:2190: bzhin med pa stong pa'i nga rgyal gsal ba ste
NK090(u)007:2191: / 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos por grub kyang /
NK090(u)007:2192: rig pa'i yul du ma grub par thogs pa med par bsgom /
NK090(u)007:2193: de nas de la brtan pa thob na /
NK090(u)007:2194: 'di ltar snang ba'i lha 'di gang nas 'ong /
NK090(u)007:2195: ngo bo ji ltar gnas dpyad pa na /
NK090(u)007:2196: phyi rol gyi yul gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
NK090(u)007:2199: rang sems kyi snang ba lhar shar ba tsam ste
NK090(u)007:2200: sems tshogs drug gi yul du snang ba'i 'jug shes
NK090(u)007:2201: drug dang / de gang las 'char ba'i gzhi kun gzhi'i rnam shes dang /
NK090(u)007:2202: nyon yid de rnam shes tshogs brgyad po lha'i sku dang ye shes su snang ba nyid do //
NK090(u)007:2204: snang srid rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i dbyings //
NK090(u)007:2206: don la gzhi dbyings kun gzhi rang byung gi ye
NK090(u)007:2207: shes rig pa byang chub kyi sems sras bde ba
NK090(u)007:2208: chen po sangs rgyas chos kyi sku'am /
NK090(u)007:2209: don dam pa'i lhar grub pa de'i rtsal lam gdangs
NK090(u)007:2210: sgrib g.yogs bral ba'i tshul du shar bas de'i ngo
NK090(u)007:2211: bo nyid de / de las logs su med la /
NK090(u)007:2212: da ltar lhar snang ba 'di yang /
NK090(u)007:2213: rnam pa yid kyis bsgom pa'i mthu las sku gsung
NK090(u)007:2214: thugs rdo rje lta bur snang yang btsal na ji
NK090(u)007:2216: 'di zhes btags su med cing bstan du med pa don dam pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku'o //
NK090(u)007:2218: de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa'i dam tshig drug la /
NK090(u)007:2220: man ngag ston pa'i bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos
NK090(u)007:2221: su mos gus kyi gdung ba rgyun mi bcad pa
NK090(u)007:2222: dang gcig /ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mthun phyogs grogs su
NK090(u)007:2223: 'gyur ba'i man ngag gi gnad dang dpe cha tshags
NK090(u)007:2225: mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'gal rkyen rnams 'dor ba dang gsum /
NK090(u)007:2226: 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug sogs spyod lam kun tu bsgom
NK090(u)007:2227: bya'i ting nge 'dzin yid nas yal bar mi 'dor
NK090(u)007:2228: ba dang bzhi / yi dam gang bsgom pa de mi spangs shing /
NK090(u)007:2229: de nyid kyi bsgom sgrub mthar dbyung ba dang lnga /
NK090(u)007:2230: yi dam gyi lha spong len mi bya bar lha
NK090(u)007:2231: gang bsgom yang sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa ro
NK090(u)007:2232: gcig tu rtogs pas lha gcig bsgom kyang sangs rgyas
NK090(u)007:2233: bsgom pa yin par shes pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2234: sangs rgyas kyang rang gi sems rtogs pa las logs na bsgom rgyu med /
NK090(u)007:2235: yi dam lha yang rang sems kyi snang ba yin
NK090(u)007:2236: la logs shig nas sgrub rgyu dang sgom rgyu ci
NK090(u)007:2237: yang med / mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad yi dam gyi lha la 'dus /
NK090(u)007:2238: yi dam gyi lha mang po sgom yang rang sems kyi snang ba /
NK090(u)007:2239: gcig bsgom yang sems kyi snang ba yin snyam shes pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2240: rang gi bsgom bya'i yi dam dang /
NK090(u)007:2242: spyod pa rnams snod min la shin tu gsang zhing
NK090(u)007:2243: sba ba dang drug ste bsgom pa'i dam tshig de
NK090(u)007:2245: de dag ni lha don la sbyar ba zhes bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2246: don bdun pa lha lam du khyer zhing sgrub pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2247: de ltar gsal thebs shing bskyed rim brtan pa des /
NK090(u)007:2248: rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i sgrub
NK090(u)007:2249: pa'i dkyil 'khor bshams shing las gzhung bsrang ste bsgom
NK090(u)007:2250: bzlas mchod bstod dang tshogs la sogs pa sgrub tshul
NK090(u)007:2251: gzhung bzhin du bya ba rnams so //
NK090(u)007:2252: de ltar ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i 'bras bu gnas skabs dang khyad par gnyis las /
NK090(u)007:2253: dang po lha la sems zin pas dbang po'i shes
NK090(u)007:2254: pa yul la 'phro ba'i rgyun kheg ste dbang shes
NK090(u)007:2255: kyi bzhon pa'i rlung rnams nang du ldog nye ba'i
NK090(u)007:2256: ltas sogs mchog gi rtags lnga dang /
NK090(u)007:2257: sangs rgyas byang sems kyis chos kyi bgro ba mdzad
NK090(u)007:2258: pa mthong ba sogs sgyu 'phrul gyi bsnyen yig las
NK090(u)007:2260: 'di ni spyi mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa las /
NK090(u)007:2261: bzang ba'i rmi ltas brgyad bshad pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2262: dang po sdig sgrib dang bag chags byang ba'i ltas ni /
NK090(u)007:2263: sgren mor phyung dang rtag par 'khru //
NK090(u)007:2265: lus gcer bur phyung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2266: rtag par 'khru ba rmis pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2267: chu bo gtsang ma la 'bog pa ste brgal zhing 'gro ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2268: rkyal byed pa rmi ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2269: char rgyun dang bum chus khrus nas dbyung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2270: rang gi lus mes bsregs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2272: dum bur 'thor ba lasogasa rmis pa ste /
NK090(u)007:2273: sdig sgrib dang bag chags 'byang ba'i ltas dang /
NK090(u)007:2276: lcags su bcug pa las grol ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2277: gshed ma las thar ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2278: gdug pa'i sems can dang bral ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2280: bcings pa dkrol ba dang bcad pa rmi ba ste 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i ltas dang /
NK090(u)007:2281: khri'u shing dang rkang bzhi lta bu stegs mthon po dang /
NK090(u)007:2283: skas la sogs par 'dzegs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2285: ri rtse dang mchod rten la 'dzegs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2286: nam mkhar skas 'dzug ste 'dzegs par rmi ba ni /
NK090(u)007:2287: gong nas gong du sa 'phar ba sa thob par 'gyur ba'i ltas dang /
NK090(u)007:2288: khri mthon po la 'dug pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2291: khyung la sogs pa 'dab chags kyi rigs rnams la zhon pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2293: ri bo'i rtser sleb pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2294: nam mkha' mthon po'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2295: lus las sprin byung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2296: nyi zla'i steng du 'dug pa rmis pa ni sa non pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2297: sa la gnas pa'i rtags dang /
NK090(u)007:2298: rgyal po'i bka' rtags thob pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2299: gzhan gyi zhal lce gcod pa'i dpang po byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2300: gzhan la dbang bsgyur ba'i dpon byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2301: 'jig rten bskos la phab pa ste yul ris dang sa zhing gi bskos bzhag byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2302: yul khams dbang du bsdu ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2305: mgo la me tog gi thod skyes pa rmis pa
NK090(u)007:2306: ste sangs rgyas kyi sras su 'gyur ba'i ltas dang
NK090(u)007:2310: gzhan la ston cing bshad pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2312: chu bum pa gang ba la lta rtog byed cing 'thung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2313: nor bu'i chu rgyun 'thung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2314: 'khor lo lag tu bab pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2315: nyi zla lag pas zin pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2316: ri rab bar snang nas bskor ba byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2317: lus las chos sgra 'byung bas stong gsum gang ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2318: dngos po mtha' dag yi ger mthong ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2319: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten mthong ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2320: gling bzhi gling phran bsgrod pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2321: ri rab kyi rtser phyin nas gling rnams mthong ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2322: rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2323: sgron me lag tu thogs te 'jig rten gsal bar byed dang /
NK090(u)007:2324: snang srid kun la zhib mor dpyod pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2325: nyi ma'i snying po la blta ba rmis pa ste bden pa mthong ba'i ltas so //
NK090(u)007:2326: gzhan yang sbyor ba phyi yi drod /
NK090(u)007:2328: rang bzhin gsang ba'i drod gsum ste 'di dag ni dngos su 'byung ba ste /
NK090(u)007:2329: sgom pa'i tshe rdul phran dang /
NK090(u)007:2332: sku phra mo la sogs pa spyod yul rags par mthong ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2333: me dang chu la sogs pa kha dog lnga yi skye mched mthong ba'o //
NK090(u)007:2334: gnyis pa mtshan ma nang gi drod ni lha sgom
NK090(u)007:2335: pas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba mi tshor ba
NK090(u)007:2336: dang / lus yod du mi tshor ba shing bal
NK090(u)007:2337: ltar yangs shing ltog skom sogs kyis mi gnod pa
NK090(u)007:2338: dang / dang / rgas shing rgud pa med pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2339: gsum pa gsang ba rang bzhin gyi drod ni /
NK090(u)007:2340: lha sku sgyu ma ltar sgom pas ye shes rang gsal te /
NK090(u)007:2341: snying rje mnyam pa nyid du skye ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2342: spyod yul ye shes su skye ba'o //
NK090(u)007:2343: rtags ni phyi rtags su 'od 'byung ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2351: nang gi rtags ni sngar bas snying rje che ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2354: dam tshig gtsang zhing bla ma dang rdo rje spun la sngar bas gdung sems che ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2355: 'khor ba la re dogs med pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2356: bdud bgegs la nyam mi nga ba sogs /
NK090(u)007:2357: mdor na tshul bzhin sgom na drod rtags 'byung ba
NK090(u)007:2358: chos nyid yin pas dga' drod dang rlom sems spangs
NK090(u)007:2359: te de dag thams cad 'dzin zhen med par sgom
NK090(u)007:2360: pas gnas skabs kyi phan yon lha sgom pas kun
NK090(u)007:2361: brtags 'khrul pa'i dri ma byang zhing dag pa'i phyir
NK090(u)007:2362: las nyon skye gnas kyi sgrib pa 'byang /
NK090(u)007:2363: tshogs gnyis khyad par myur du rdzogs par byed pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2364: de dag gi dgos pa ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i phan yon dran pa'i shes byed du smos pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2365: da ni khyad par gyi 'bras bu de ltar tha
NK090(u)007:2366: mal ma dag pa'i snang zhen gyi gnyen po thabs
NK090(u)007:2367: bskyed pa'i rim pa la goms pas /
NK090(u)007:2368: mdo pa rang gi chos skad du 'gyur ba la
NK090(u)007:2369: nges pa'i sa sogs rgyu 'bras kyi sa bcu gsum
NK090(u)007:2370: po bsgrod nas mi slob pa sku lnga lhun grub
NK090(u)007:2371: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang la sbyor ba yin
NK090(u)007:2372: pas / de'i tshul cung zad 'god na /
NK090(u)007:2374: sa bcu'i bsgrod pas mi slob pa'i sar gshegs pa ste /
NK090(u)007:2375: rgyud dgongs pa 'dus pa'i gleng gzhi'i skabs na /
NK090(u)007:2382: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i lam la 'khod do //
NK090(u)007:2384: dang po tshogs lam 'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor
NK090(u)007:2385: la rdzogs rim dkyil 'khor gsum gyi ye shes la
NK090(u)007:2386: go ba rnal mar chags shing bskyed pa'i rim pa
NK090(u)007:2387: la sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin lam nges rdzogs
NK090(u)007:2388: su sgom pas / dang po 'gyur ba ma nges pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2389: gnyis pa brten pa gzhi'i sa gnyis kyis bsdus pa
NK090(u)007:2390: tshogs lam 'dun pa sems pa las dang po'i rnal
NK090(u)007:2391: 'byor las su rung bas thun mong gi dngos grub
NK090(u)007:2393: gser 'gyur gyi rtsi ral gri'i dngos grub /
NK090(u)007:2397: dbang po drug gi mngon shes las chen bzhi 'grub cing /
NK090(u)007:2398: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa sgom pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2400: mngon mtho'i lam dang thabs lam nyan thos rang rgyal byang sems kyi lam rnams bsgom pas /
NK090(u)007:2401: sbyor lam rigs chen 'byed pa gal chen sbyong ba'i sa /
NK090(u)007:2403: bsod nams rten gyi sa gsum gyis bsdus pa rigs
NK090(u)007:2404: chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor zag bcas lam gyi rtse
NK090(u)007:2407: lo'am zla ba'i grangs bzhin du //
NK090(u)007:2408: thabs dang cho ga ldan spyod pas //
NK090(u)007:2409: zag med snang ba'i lam la gnas //
NK090(u)007:2410: skye 'jigs med pa'i skur gyur te //
NK090(u)007:2411: bskal pa grangs med tshe la dbang //
NK090(u)007:2412: bden pa'i ngo mthong 'jigs pa med //
NK090(u)007:2413: zhes gsungs pa ltar tshom bu tshogs kyi sgrub pa'i
NK090(u)007:2414: nye rgyu la brten nas mchog gi dngos grub la
NK090(u)007:2415: sbyor ba'o // de yang phun sum tshogs pa lngas gzhi bzung /
NK090(u)007:2416: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis gzhung bsrang /
NK090(u)007:2417: 'bras bu rig 'dzin 'grub pa'i dus tshod la sbyar
NK090(u)007:2418: ba'i tshul rnams sgyu 'phrul gyi bsnyen yig tu bshad
NK090(u)007:2420: de yang nub tha ma na srod la dgra las dngos grub blang ba la /
NK090(u)007:2421: 'tshengs pa gsum dang ldan par bya ba ste /
NK090(u)007:2422: 'jig rten gyi khams na zhing bcu tshang ba'i dgra
NK090(u)007:2423: bgegs gang yin pa dgugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK090(u)007:2424: dngos su bkugs nas phyag rgya bzhes 'gugs 'ching sdom
NK090(u)007:2425: myos byas te / dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar mtshams su bzhag pa /
NK090(u)007:2426: mchod dpon sgrol ging rdo rje king ka ra'i rnam
NK090(u)007:2427: par bzhengs nas ral gri 'jam dpal rnon por gsal
NK090(u)007:2428: bas khog pa kha phyes nas ral gri'i 'od zer
NK090(u)007:2429: gyis kho'i rgyud kyi ma rig pa dang las nyon
NK090(u)007:2431: lag pa'i sor mo g.yas g.yon bcur rigs lnga'i sa bon dang /
NK090(u)007:2432: de yongs su gyur pa las rigs lnga yab yum du gsal bas bsgrub bya'i snying bzung ste /
NK090(u)007:2433: rigs lnga'i 'od zer gyis kho'i rigs drug tu skye
NK090(u)007:2434: ba'i sa bon bag chags dang bcas pa sbyang nas
NK090(u)007:2435: / snying de thod pa'i nang du bzhag nas /
NK090(u)007:2436: rdo rje slob dpon gyi phyag tu bzhag pas kho'i
NK090(u)007:2437: rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo h'u yig kha dog
NK090(u)007:2438: lnga dang ldan pa de nyid /
NK090(u)007:2439: slob dpon gyi shangs nas h'u ring gi rlung dang
NK090(u)007:2440: mnyam du drang nas spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor
NK090(u)007:2441: lor lhag pa'i lha'i thugs kar 'phangs pas bsgral bya
NK090(u)007:2442: gnas kyis 'tshengs / kho'i tshe dang bsod nams lhag
NK090(u)007:2443: ma a n+ri dkar dmar gyi rnam par slob dpon
NK090(u)007:2444: nyid la bstim pas sgrol ba po tshe lhag gis
NK090(u)007:2445: gnas kyis 'tshengs / 'tshengs / sha khrag rnams ye
NK090(u)007:2446: shes kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas lha dang
NK090(u)007:2447: dam can rnams la bstabs pas dam can sha khrag
NK090(u)007:2448: gis 'tshengs pa ste 'tshengs pa gsum ldan gyis dgra
NK090(u)007:2450: gung la bdag bskyed kyi thugs las 'od zer dmar
NK090(u)007:2451: po spros nas mdun bskyed kyi thugs kar phog thugs
NK090(u)007:2453: mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros /
NK090(u)007:2454: phyogs dus kyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul /
NK090(u)007:2455: dngos grub kyi 'od zer mdun bskyed la thim /
NK090(u)007:2456: mdun bskyed kyi thugs ka nas 'od zer mchog gi
NK090(u)007:2457: dngos grub mtshon pa kha dog sngon po'i rnam par
NK090(u)007:2458: 'phros nas bdag la thim pas mchog gi dngos grub
NK090(u)007:2459: thob par bsam nas gtso bo'i rtsa sngags la dngos
NK090(u)007:2460: grub bskul ba'i sham bu btags tshul 'og gi dngos
NK090(u)007:2461: grub la sham bu btags tshul las gsal ba ltar
NK090(u)007:2462: bzlas nas lha las dngos grub len /
NK090(u)007:2463: tho rangs 'od gsal ba'i dus su yum las dngos
NK090(u)007:2464: grub blangs pas thig le yas babs kyi mtha' na
NK090(u)007:2465: dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyams kyi
NK090(u)007:2466: zhen pa dang ma bral ba'i dpe'i 'od gsal brnyes
NK090(u)007:2467: / thig le mas brtan gyi mtha' na rang bzhin lhan gcig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes /
NK090(u)007:2468: nyams snang mched thob pa gsum dang bral ba'i ye
NK090(u)007:2469: shes ye ji bzhin pa'i don gyi 'od gsal brnyes
NK090(u)007:2470: nas / de la ldang ba na lha sku sgyu ma lta bu /
NK090(u)007:2471: da lta rang gis sgom pa'i lha de'i sku mdog
NK090(u)007:2472: phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam
NK090(u)007:2473: par ldang zhing don gyi 'od gsal mngon du gyur
NK090(u)007:2474: pa'i rjes nas rtsa ba'i ma rig pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2475: rkyen gyis ma rig pa gnyis kyi rags pa'i cha spang /
NK090(u)007:2476: phra ba'i cha rnams sgom pa'i lam du spang ba yin /
NK090(u)007:2477: mdo 'di na rig 'dzin de tshe la dbang nas
NK090(u)007:2478: rten de nyid du 'tshang rgya bar gsungs pas de'i
NK090(u)007:2479: rgyu mtshan mdo rang gi ngang sgom phyi ma gsum
NK090(u)007:2480: gyis rlung dang thig le la dbang thob pas snying
NK090(u)007:2481: ga dang srog 'dzin gnyis kyi rlung la rang dbang
NK090(u)007:2482: ba dang / mtha' brten bkra shis tshe'i sgrub pa mthar phyin pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2483: bdud rtsi sman gyi sgrub pas bdag lus kyi snyigs
NK090(u)007:2484: ma'i dwangs ma bdud rtsi lngar gnas 'gyur ba'i rgyu
NK090(u)007:2485: mtshan gsum gyis yin par shes so //
NK090(u)007:2486: lam lnga po'i skabs kyi sgrib pa spangs tshul la /
NK090(u)007:2487: chos rje dam pa rin po chos tshogs lam bdun
NK090(u)007:2488: pa sems pa na thos bsam gyi shes rab kyis
NK090(u)007:2489: sgrub pa sun 'byin gyi tshul gyis spang /
NK090(u)007:2490: sbyor lam rigs chen 'byed pa na 'jig rten pa'i bsgom byung gis mgo non pa'i tshul gyis spang /
NK090(u)007:2491: mthong lam du dbugs chen 'byin pa'i skabs nas 'jig
NK090(u)007:2492: rten las 'das pa'i bsgom byung gis rags pa'i cha
NK090(u)007:2493: rnams spangs / bsgom lam lung chen thob pa na phra ba'i cha dang /
NK090(u)007:2494: mthar lam na phra ba'i phra ba'i cha rnams spang ba yin no //
NK090(u)007:2495: zhes gsungs pa 'di rig pas shin tu dpyad bzod pa'i gsung zab cing barlinga bar shes so //
NK090(u)007:2496: de yang kri ya u pa yo ga rnams la
NK090(u)007:2497: sbyangs pas mchog gi dngos grub la brten pas khyad
NK090(u)007:2498: par du 'gro ba'i sas bsdus pa mthong lam dbugs
NK090(u)007:2500: chos nyid kyi rang mtshan mngon sum du mthong bas
NK090(u)007:2501: zag med lam gyi thog mar gyur pa de dang
NK090(u)007:2502: / ma h+aa dang a nu a ti yo ga'i ngang sgom rnams la /
NK090(u)007:2503: sbyor lam nas bslabs pa'i 'bras bu mthong zin nas
NK090(u)007:2504: goms par byed pa'i lam dmigs pa 'bras bu skye
NK090(u)007:2505: ba'i sas bsdus pa sgom lam lung chen thob pa'i
NK090(u)007:2506: rnal 'byor sa brgyad pa gnas pa mi 'gyur ba'i
NK090(u)007:2507: sa dang / dgu pa brdal ba chos nyid kyi sa dang /
NK090(u)007:2508: bcu pa rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa bsgrod nas /
NK090(u)007:2509: mi slob pa rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa la nang gses pad+ma can /
NK090(u)007:2511: ye shes bla ma'i sa gsum nas mi slob pa'i 'bras bu mngon du gyur pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2512: de yang 'bras bu sa gsum po gong nas gong
NK090(u)007:2513: du bsgrod du yod par bstan pa ma yin par
NK090(u)007:2515: mngon par byang chub pa'i sku gnyis dbyer mi phyed
NK090(u)007:2516: pa ngo bo nyid sku'i cha nas btags te 'bras
NK090(u)007:2517: bu'i sa gsum zhes gsungs so //
NK090(u)007:2518: de dag gis lam nges rdzogs kyi dbang du byas
NK090(u)007:2519: nas goms pa gtso bor byed pa'i khyad par 'bras
NK090(u)007:2520: bu dang bcas pa bstan zin nas /
NK090(u)007:2521: da ni dbang po yang rab dang /
NK090(u)007:2522: 'bring gis bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan pa cung zad thob pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2523: mos bsgom gyi dbang du byas nas /
NK090(u)007:2525: bskyed rim gsal 'debs brjod pa tshig gi sgo //
NK090(u)007:2526: dmigs pa rtse gcig ting 'dzin yid kyi sgo //
NK090(u)007:2527: mtshon pa brdar btags phyag rgya gar gyi sgo //
NK090(u)007:2528: thugs dam gnad bskul gsang ba sngags kyi sgo //
NK090(u)007:2530: dang po bskyed rim gsal 'debs kyi las byang ci
NK090(u)007:2531: mgyogs kyi tshar sla ba'i thabs mi byed par tshig
NK090(u)007:2532: rnams brjod pa dal ba de'i rjes su sems kyis
NK090(u)007:2533: dmigs pa zin par bya dgos pas /
NK090(u)007:2534: snga dro'i thun la bsam gtan gyi sngon du 'gro ba rnams grub par byas te /
NK090(u)007:2536: khyad par gyi theg pas gdul bar bya ba'i yul
NK090(u)007:2537: la khyad par can gyi 'dul byed zab mo brtsam
NK090(u)007:2538: par bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam brtse gcig pas
NK090(u)007:2540: gdod nas ma skyes sogs kyis sems bskyed nas /
NK090(u)007:2543: sgrub pa'i bar gcod ci yang med par shog /na
NK090(u)007:2544: mo h'u bar btang nas phyogs bcu'i bgegs la khro
NK090(u)007:2545: bo bcu stod zhal gsum phyag drug pa smad phur
NK090(u)007:2546: bu'i rnam par bgegs rnams kyi snying dkar nag gi
NK090(u)007:2547: mtshams su btab pas g.yo ba med par bsam /
NK090(u)007:2548: de'i phyi rol du mtshon cha lnga'i gur gyi phyi
NK090(u)007:2549: rol me dpung 'bar ba'i khro chung gi tsh+wa tsh+wa
NK090(u)007:2551: thun gzhan gsum la khro bcu'i sngags tsam brjod nas dmigs pa sngar bzhin bsam pas 'thus /
NK090(u)007:2552: dgong mo yang bskyed rim gyi lha snang bsdu dus
NK090(u)007:2553: srung 'khor mi bsdu bar slar gsal btab la mtshams
NK090(u)007:2555: mtshams grol nyin gyi rjes chog skabs bsdu bar bya dgos so //
NK090(u)007:2556: de nas ye shes sku mchog sogs nas gzhung nar 'ded kyis bstod pa rdzogs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2558: hoh phyogs bcu bdus bzhi nas /
NK090(u)007:2559: 'gro don ma lus lhun gyis grub par shog /na mo h'u bar btang /
NK090(u)007:2560: thugs dam gnad bskul gsang ba sngags kyi zhes pas /
NK090(u)007:2561: 'dzab kyi skabs la bab pa na /
NK090(u)007:2562: dbye gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bdag dam tshig pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK090(u)007:2563: gsal 'debs pa'i cho ga'i tshig ris gcig gis mdun
NK090(u)007:2564: bskyed yang gsal thebs na dang /
NK090(u)007:2565: ma thebs na gzod mdun bskyed kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba la /
NK090(u)007:2566: b+h+r+aum bi shwa sogs kyis me ri 'dab 'byor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur gyi bar du btang /
NK090(u)007:2567: de rab rib gnyis pa zhig dang bcas par bsam dgos kyang /
NK090(u)007:2568: bsnyen pa ci tsam 'dug pa'i phyed yan chad la
NK090(u)007:2569: bdag bskyed dam tshig sems dpa'i thugs kar ye shes
NK090(u)007:2570: sems dpa' dang / de'i thugs kar ting 'dzin sems
NK090(u)007:2571: dpa' lha rang rang gi phyag mtshan sa bon gyis
NK090(u)007:2572: mtshan pa la bzla bya'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsam
NK090(u)007:2573: sems dpa' dang / nas sngags bazla'o // sems dpa'
NK090(u)007:2574: sum brtsegs su gsal ba 'di ci nas gal che
NK090(u)007:2575: sems dpa' dang / nas sngags bazla'o // bar snang
NK090(u)007:2576: ste / bdag gi ma dag pa'i rtsa rlung rags
NK090(u)007:2577: pa'i cha sbyang ba'am dam tshig sems dpar gsal nas
NK090(u)007:2578: phra ba'i rtsa rlung thig le'i cha sbyang ba la
NK090(u)007:2579: dag pa mngon gyur gyi ye shes sems dpar gsal
NK090(u)007:2580: sems dpa' dang / nas sngags bazla'o // bar snang
NK090(u)007:2581: ste / ba dang / rang gi sems ma dag
NK090(u)007:2582: pa'i cha sbyang ba la sems nyid bde bar gshegs
NK090(u)007:2583: pa'i snying po ting 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2584: 'di la dzapa dgongs rnam pa bzhi zhes zla ba skar phreng gi dgongs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2585: rgyal po'i pho nya lta bu'i dzapa dgongs gnyis gtso cher ma h+aa dang /
NK090(u)007:2586: do li'am khyogs kyi bzlas pa bzhi'i rang lugs dang /
NK090(u)007:2587: bung ba tshang zhig gi bzlas pa a ti yo
NK090(u)007:2588: ga'i lugs yin par gong ma rnams kyi zhal rgyun
NK090(u)007:2589: du byung kyang / 'dir ni dzapa dgongs rnam pa
NK090(u)007:2590: bzhi po gzhung gcig la sbyar kyang 'thad par sems
NK090(u)007:2591: du byung kyang / pas / dang po zla ba
NK090(u)007:2592: la skar phreng gis bskor ba ltar rtsa ba'i sa
NK090(u)007:2593: bon la bzla bya'i sngags kyis bskor ba la sems
NK090(u)007:2594: dmigs pa rtse gcig tu gtad pas de la sems
NK090(u)007:2595: legs par zin pa zhig gi bar du bsam nas
NK090(u)007:2597: rlung sngags sems gsum dbyer med pa sngags kyi sgra gdangs su nges pa gal che'o //
NK090(u)007:2598: de nas gnyis pa rgyal po'i pho nya lta bu'i dzapa dgongs ni /
NK090(u)007:2599: bdag gi thugs ka'i sngags kyi 'od zer mchod pa'i
NK090(u)007:2600: tshul sogs kyis bzla bya'i dmigs pa rnams mdun bskyed
NK090(u)007:2602: bdag bskyed kyi skabs 'dir ni 'og min na bzhugs
NK090(u)007:2603: pa'i ye shes pa'i lha la mchod pa'i tshul du
NK090(u)007:2604: spros te / lha ye shes pa'i sku gsung thugs
NK090(u)007:2605: kyi dngos grub dang byin rlabs thams cad 'od dang
NK090(u)007:2606: 'od zer gyi rnam pas bdag la stsal zhing thim
NK090(u)007:2608: gzhan yang thun mong gi zhi rgyas dbang drag gi
NK090(u)007:2609: las bzhi sgrub pa la dmigs pa'i 'od zer spro
NK090(u)007:2610: bsdus las rab 'byams sgrub pa'i dmigs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2612: nyon mongs pa zhi ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2613: shes rab kyi rtsal rgyas pa /
NK090(u)007:2614: ji lta ji snyed kyi ye shes dbang du bya ba /
NK090(u)007:2615: las dang bag chags tshar gcod pa rnams dmigs pa
NK090(u)007:2616: sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du kho nas bya ba
NK090(u)007:2617: nyid do // gsum pa khyogs kyi 'am do li'i bzlas pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2618: thugs ka'i sngags phreng las sngags phreng gnyis pa mang po rtsa ba'i lha'i sku mdog dang mthun pa'am /
NK090(u)007:2619: yang na 'od zer dkar po'i thag pas lu gu
NK090(u)007:2620: rgyud du 'brel ba byung ste ye shes sems dpa'i
NK090(u)007:2622: bdag dam tshig pa'i shangs g.yas nas thon /
NK090(u)007:2623: yum gyi shangs g.yon pa nas zhugs /
NK090(u)007:2624: yum gyi thugs ka'i sa bon la g.yon bskor du 'khor nas sku'i dbyibs brgyud /
NK090(u)007:2625: gsang ba nas yab kyi rdo rje nor bu'i lam nas sku'i dbyings brgyud /
NK090(u)007:2626: yab kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i sngags phreng la thim par dmigs nas bazla'o //
NK090(u)007:2627: de yang sems bying shas chen steng dang /
NK090(u)007:2628: rgod shas che na 'og gi do li'i bzlas pa bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2629: 'di la 'ga' zhig gis sngags 'bru snga ma la
NK090(u)007:2630: phyi mas bzung nas 'brel ba'i bshad pa zhig snang
NK090(u)007:2631: yang / 'dir ni 'od zer gyi thag pas 'brel
NK090(u)007:2632: bar dmigs pa 'di lung gi skabs kyi thig le
NK090(u)007:2633: dbab 'dren gyi skabs su shin tu gal che bas
NK090(u)007:2635: bzhi pa bung ba tshang zhig gi bzlas pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2636: phyi nang gi sgra skad thams cad sngags kyi sgra gdangs su yang dang yang du gom pas /
NK090(u)007:2638: phyi rol gyi 'byung ba'i sgra skad dang /
NK090(u)007:2639: nang sems can gyi sgra skad thams cad la ched
NK090(u)007:2640: du blo ma gtad kyang de'i rang gi blo la
NK090(u)007:2641: tshur sngags kyis nga rgyal gsal btab pa bzhin /
NK090(u)007:2642: sgra grags thams cad sngags kyi sgra gdangs su 'ur
NK090(u)007:2643: 'ur 'ong ba zhig gi bar du sgra gdangs goms
NK090(u)007:2644: pa ma byang gi bar dmigs pas goms par byed
NK090(u)007:2645: pa'o // 'di bzhi po bskyed rdzogs gnyis kar sbyar shes dgos pa yin no //
NK090(u)007:2646: phyogs res bshad pas gnad tshang bar 'ong ba dka' /
NK090(u)007:2647: de ltar sgrub pa ci tsam gyi phyed yan chad la bdag bskyed kho nas bzlas pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2648: phyed man chad nas gzod mdun bskyed nges par gsal
NK090(u)007:2649: gdab nas gnyis ka'i lha snang ma shor ba'i ngang
NK090(u)007:2650: nas 'dzab dgongs bzhi po sbyar nas bazla'o //
NK090(u)007:2651: de ltar rgyud lung gnyis ka bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag bzhi po sbyar shes pa zhig dgos te /
NK090(u)007:2653: rdo rje tshogs te bsnyen pa dang //
NK090(u)007:2654: nye ba dang ni sgrub pa dang //
NK090(u)007:2655: sgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya //
NK090(u)007:2656: zhes pa la bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi la lam
NK090(u)007:2657: nges rdzogs dang mos slob gnyis kar sbyar shes pa
NK090(u)007:2658: zhig khag che'o // thun phyi ma gsum la /
NK090(u)007:2659: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
NK090(u)007:2661: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin nas khyams lnga
NK090(u)007:2662: par ma bdun sring bzhi bskyed pa'i mjug /nyin mtshan
NK090(u)007:2663: rtag tu thams cad skyob par shog /na mo h'u
NK090(u)007:2664: bar btang na khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor yin
NK090(u)007:2665: pas khams gsum gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bzhag na chog
NK090(u)007:2668: byin gyis brlabs pa gnyis sngags tsam gyis 'thus /
NK090(u)007:2669: spyan 'dren nas bzhugs gsol bar dkyus bzhin las /
NK090(u)007:2670: kun bzang bzhi bsnol gyis mchod /
NK090(u)007:2671: sman gtor rak+ta rnams sngags kyis 'thus /
NK090(u)007:2672: bstod pa nas dzapa kyi bar dkyus ltar btang /
NK090(u)007:2673: dbye gzhi dkyil 'khor skad cig gis gsal btab la /
NK090(u)007:2674: kun bzang yab yum sngags bye ba gcig /rigs lnga la 'bum phrag re /
NK090(u)007:2675: sems dpa' sems ma thub drug sgo ba bcas la khri lnga re /
NK090(u)007:2676: khro bo che mchog yab yum la ru lu sbyar ba 'bum phrag bdun /
NK090(u)007:2677: rgyud lung gi khro bo dgu la bskyed sngags dang ru lu sbyar ba 'bum phrag re /
NK090(u)007:2678: de phyin chad rnams la bskyed sngags ru lu sbyar ba khri re /
NK090(u)007:2679: rig 'dzin la 'bum phrag gcig /zhi ba'i spyi sngags gu h+ya bco lnga pa 'bum phrag bzhi /
NK090(u)007:2680: khro bo spyi dril ru lu 'bum phrag bzhi 'grub na /
NK090(u)007:2681: phun sum tshogs pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur la /
NK090(u)007:2682: de tsam mi lcogs na kun bzang yab yum 'bum phrag bzhi /
NK090(u)007:2684: de phyin chad la khri re /
NK090(u)007:2686: khro bo'i gtso bo che mchog yab yum sngags ru lu ma sbyar 'bum phrag bzhi /
NK090(u)007:2687: rgyud lung gi khro bo dgu la rang sngags khri lnga re /
NK090(u)007:2688: de man chad kyi sngags rnams khri lnga re /
NK090(u)007:2689: spyi dril ru lu 'bum phrag bzhi grub nges par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2690: dgong thun gyi mjug tu legs ldan gyi gtor bsngosa re dgos /
NK090(u)007:2691: thun re nas 'dzab khang bsdu ba dang /
NK090(u)007:2692: nyer bsdu go bgo lus bsrung bar rdzogs par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2693: yar mar gyi tshes bcu dang dus chen rnams la tshogs mchod re grub par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2694: de ltar rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa legs par grub pa
NK090(u)007:2695: na bdud rtsi sman gyi sgrub pa'i bsnyen pa la
NK090(u)007:2697: bzlas pa la bab pa na rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor zhal bsgyur mi dgos /
NK090(u)007:2698: rang gi thugs ka'i sngags phreng las byung ba'i 'od
NK090(u)007:2699: zer dang mtheb srin rta mgrin yab yum du mnyam
NK090(u)007:2700: par rol pa'i byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gzugs
NK090(u)007:2701: thag rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khong gseng nas
NK090(u)007:2702: song ba bdud rtsi'i pho brang la phog /des bdud
NK090(u)007:2703: rtsi sbyang bzhu sbar ba'i rlangs pas dkyil 'khor lha
NK090(u)007:2704: tshogs thams cad kyi thugs rgyud bskul /
NK090(u)007:2705: rjes chags kyis rol pas byang chub sems kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK090(u)007:2706: 'khor 'das kyi bdud rtsi thams cad bsdus nas yab
NK090(u)007:2707: yum dgyes par rol pa'i byang chub sems kyi rgyun
NK090(u)007:2708: babs pa dang lhan cig bdud rtsi la thim pas
NK090(u)007:2709: zhu zhing 'dres nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya
NK090(u)007:2711: rdzogs pa'i ye shes rmad po che //
NK090(u)007:2712: zla gam dkyil 'khor rin chen dbang //
NK090(u)007:2713: shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas nas //
NK090(u)007:2715: mchod khang yid bzhin rin po che //
NK090(u)007:2716: ru lu 'bru brgyad ye shes phreng //
NK090(u)007:2717: phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul //
NK090(u)007:2718: slar 'dus pas ni dngos grub stsol //
NK090(u)007:2719: 'di yang bsnyen pa'i mchog yin te //
NK090(u)007:2720: nam yang nyams pa'i dus mtha' med //
NK090(u)007:2721: dug gsum dbyings su sbyang bar mdzod //
NK090(u)007:2723: g.yon pa'i mtheb srin gyis gzungs thag 'jus te /
NK090(u)007:2724: gu h+ya bco lnga pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2725: ru lu 'bru brgyad nyis brgya re dang /
NK090(u)007:2726: sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+ai tha /
NK090(u)007:2731: 'dzab khang bsdu ba thams cad sgrub thabs ltar bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2732: de nas tshe'i 'brang rgyas zla gam /
NK090(u)007:2737: 'dir ni che mchog rtsa ba'i mchi med rdo rje'i
NK090(u)007:2738: dkyil 'khor nyid la brten nas tshe sgrub pa ste
NK090(u)007:2739: tshe dpag med kyi lha bskyed de 'dir sbyar mi
NK090(u)007:2740: dgos / sgrub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs de nyid
NK090(u)007:2741: kyi gzhung sngar bzhin bsrang nas 'dzab kyi skabs su
NK090(u)007:2742: dgos / bab pa na / sngar bshams pa'i tshe rdzas la dmigs te /
NK090(u)007:2743: zhi ba spyi dril gu h+ya bco lnga pa'i mthar /
NK090(u)007:2744: b+h+r+aum badz+ra +aa yu she h'u a btags nas 'bum phrag gcig bazla'o //
NK090(u)007:2746: h+r+aih nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi gzhal yas na //
NK090(u)007:2747: bcom ldan rigs lnga yab yum tshe dpag med //
NK090(u)007:2748: sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba bcas rnams kyis //
NK090(u)007:2749: tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig /
NK090(u)007:2750: n+ri b+h+r+aum h'u +aa yu she dza dzahmh'u +aah zhes tshe 'gugs nas rang la bstim mo //
NK090(u)007:2751: rgyas par 'dod na dbang chog las shes par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2752: sgrub pa'i zhag grangs rdzogs su nye ba bdun phrag tsam lhag pa'i dus /
NK090(u)007:2753: dngos grub bskul ba'i bsnyen pa 'dogs pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2754: las byang sngar bzhin dang dzapa kyi skabs zhi khro so so'i bsnyen pa brgya skor re dang /
NK090(u)007:2755: spyi dril gu h+ya bco lnga par sarba sid+d+hi dzahmh'u +aahzhesa btags la /
NK090(u)007:2756: de dag gi tshe mdun bskyed ye shes pa'i ngo bor phye la 'od zer phar mi spro bar /
NK090(u)007:2757: lha tshogs rnams kyi gnas gsum las sku gsung thugs
NK090(u)007:2758: kyi byin rlabs dang dngos grub thams cad 'od dang
NK090(u)007:2759: 'od zer gyi rnam pa bdag dang dngos grub kyi
NK090(u)007:2760: rdzas rnams la thim par bsam mo //
NK090(u)007:2761: de nas zhag rdzogs pa tha ma'i nub mo snga bar langs /
NK090(u)007:2762: las byang dkyus bzhin du btang nas zhi khro so so'i bzlas pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2763: spyi dril la dngos grub bskul ba'i sngags btags pa stong rtsa grub nas /
NK090(u)007:2764: nam langs su nye ba na dngos grub blang ba
NK090(u)007:2765: ni sgyu 'phrul gyi bsnyen yig ltar nges par bya'o
NK090(u)007:2766: // 'di'i sgrub khog gi dngos grub len tshul 'dir sbyar mi dgos /
NK090(u)007:2767: de nas go bgo lus srung man chad nas /
NK090(u)007:2768: gnas bsrung ba sogs sgyu 'phrul bsnyen yig las shes par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:2769: de dag gis sgrub pa chen po'i mdo tsam bstan nas /
NK090(u)007:2770: tshogs sgrub mtshan nyid pa lung gis skabs 'dir sgrub pa'i gang zag gi khyad par bstan pa ni /
NK090(u)007:2772: khrag 'thung las kyi rim pa las //
NK090(u)007:2774: don mchog mngon du bya ba'i phyir //
NK090(u)007:2775: sgrub pa chen po zhes su brjod //
NK090(u)007:2777: lo'am zla ba'i grangs bzhin du //
NK090(u)007:2778: thabs dang cho gar ldan spyod pas //
NK090(u)007:2779: zag med snang ba'i lam la gnas //
NK090(u)007:2780: skye 'jigs med pa'i skur gyur te //
NK090(u)007:2781: bskal pa grangs med tshe la dbang //
NK090(u)007:2782: bden pa'i don mthong 'jigs pa med //
NK090(u)007:2784: tshogs sgrub byed pa po'i gang zag drod thob pa nas 'jug pas /
NK090(u)007:2785: de'i 'bras bu mthong lam la sbyar zhing /
NK090(u)007:2786: tshe la dbang ba'i dngos grub thob par gsungs so //
NK090(u)007:2787: lo chen rin po ches 'di skabs kyi dpe don
NK090(u)007:2788: 'od gsal gnyis kyi rjes thob nas sgyu lus ldang
NK090(u)007:2789: bar mdo spyi na gsungs pas zhib tu der blta
NK090(u)007:2790: bar bya'o // da ni rtsa ba'i lnga pa la
NK090(u)007:2791: spyod pas la dor bar bya ba'i rim pa cung
NK090(u)007:2793: de ltar lta bas thag chod nyams su ting nge 'dzin thabs kyis nges pa'i lam dang /
NK090(u)007:2794: shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam /
NK090(u)007:2795: phyi ma la don gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
NK090(u)007:2796: yi ge'i rjes su 'jug pa lta sgom gyi ting nge 'dzin la /
NK090(u)007:2797: a nu rang lugs kyi spyod pa brtul zhugs nyi
NK090(u)007:2798: shu rtsa gsum gyis bogs dbyung ba'i nges pa ni
NK090(u)007:2800: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni //
NK090(u)007:2801: bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blo ldan //
NK090(u)007:2803: rang don du spyod pa bcu /
NK090(u)007:2804: gzhan don gyi spyod pa bcu /
NK090(u)007:2805: gnyis ka'i don gyi spyod pa gsum ste /
NK090(u)007:2807: wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis //
NK090(u)007:2808: spang bar bya ba'i thabs su spyad //
NK090(u)007:2809: cang shes brtul zhugs chen po yis //
NK090(u)007:2811: lus kyi rtsal gyi bya ba dag /gyi ling brtul zhugs chen por bya //
NK090(u)007:2812: glang chen myos pa'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2813: mi 'byed rmongs tshul bstan par bya //
NK090(u)007:2814: stag mchongs rngams pa'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2815: dpal brtul gtum pa'i las chen bya //
NK090(u)007:2816: khung chen mkha' lding brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2817: lta ba'i spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcod //
NK090(u)007:2818: gtum thung dom gyi brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2819: re ba med pa'i las chen bya //
NK090(u)007:2820: rgya mtsho gsar gyi brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2821: yid mthun mi ldog brtan par bya //
NK090(u)007:2822: lkug pa lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2823: gti mug bzhin du shes rab ldan //
NK090(u)007:2824: ri rab lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2825: mi 'gyur rab tu brtan par bya //
NK090(u)007:2826: nam mkha' lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2827: yang dog kun dang bral bar bya //
NK090(u)007:2828: gnam lcags lce yi brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2829: drag shul las la sbyor bar bya //
NK090(u)007:2830: lag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2831: mthu stobs dag la spyad par bya //
NK090(u)007:2832: bya rog brtul zhugs chen po yis //
NK090(u)007:2833: zon bag khu 'khrigs spyad par bya //
NK090(u)007:2834: glang chen chur 'jug brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2835: nges par nga rgyal spyad par bya //
NK090(u)007:2836: ri dwags seng ge'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2837: grogs ngan la sogs spang bar bya //
NK090(u)007:2838: reg 'jam bya yi brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2839: 'grogs na bde zhing chags par bya //
NK090(u)007:2840: sgyu ma phyag rgya'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2841: thabs la mkhas pa'i las chen bya //
NK090(u)007:2842: phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis //
NK090(u)007:2843: gtsang sme med par kun la spyad //
NK090(u)007:2844: lce spyang khra yi brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2845: thogs med gsod la brtson par bya //
NK090(u)007:2846: bar snang glog gi brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2847: ci la'ang myur mgyogs brtson par bya //
NK090(u)007:2848: mkha' lding lta bu'i brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2849: kun tu 'dzem pa'i las chen bya //
NK090(u)007:2850: rgyal po 'khor skyong brtul zhugs kyis //
NK090(u)007:2851: sa thub 'khor dang ldan par bya //
NK090(u)007:2854: thabs 'dzud bsre ba'i brtul zhugs ni /
NK090(u)007:2856: nyer gsum pa sa 'dzin rgyal po'i brtul zhugs lta
NK090(u)007:2857: ba dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa yin
NK090(u)007:2858: / bsgom pa bskyed rdzogs kyis bzung nas brtul zhugs
NK090(u)007:2859: gzhan rnams de'i 'khor du ldan par spyod pa gzhir
NK090(u)007:2860: / bcas nas / dang po wa yi brtul zhugs
NK090(u)007:2861: wa gal la zin kyang srog la mi lta bar
NK090(u)007:2862: lag pa bcad nas 'gro ba ltar rnal 'byor pa
NK090(u)007:2863: srog la bab kyang dam tshig las 'gal bar mi
NK090(u)007:2864: byed par srog brdos la thang bar spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2865: cang shes brtul zhugs cang shes pas bdag po'i yid dang mthun par sgrub pa ltar /
NK090(u)007:2866: shes bya spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid mdo sngags
NK090(u)007:2867: kyi gzhung lugs rab 'byams la thos bsam gyi shes
NK090(u)007:2868: rab khyad par can bskyed par spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2869: gyi ling gi brtul zhugs 'gre ldog byed pa ltar /
NK090(u)007:2870: bskyed rim gyi bogs 'don du rdzogs rim dang /
NK090(u)007:2871: de'i bogs 'don du bskyed rim gnyis phan tshun gcig
NK090(u)007:2872: grogs su gcig blangs te cha mnyam pa spyod pa'o
NK090(u)007:2873: // glang chen chang myos kyi brtul zhugs /
NK090(u)007:2874: lta ba 'khor 'das dbyer med mnyam nyid du lta
NK090(u)007:2875: bas goms pas ting nge 'dzin gyis mi mthun pa'i
NK090(u)007:2877: dad sogs stobs la spyod pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2878: stag gi brtul zhugs ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa gsal zhing /
NK090(u)007:2879: de dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas brtul zhugs gzhan
NK090(u)007:2880: rnams la sems dpa' brtul dang ldan par spyod pa'o
NK090(u)007:2881: // khyung chen mkha' lding gi brtul zhugs lta ba'i spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcod cing /
NK090(u)007:2882: lta bas dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med par thag
NK090(u)007:2883: chod pas 'khor 'das re dogs med par spyod pa'o
NK090(u)007:2884: // gtum chen dom lta bu'i brtul zhugs lta spyod
NK090(u)007:2885: kyi gdeng dang ldan pas drag po'i las thug phrad
NK090(u)007:2887: rgya mtsho gser tshol gyi brtul zhugs zab don gsang
NK090(u)007:2888: thub pa'i sgo nas nyams su len pa la brtson
NK090(u)007:2889: 'grus kyi / rgyun ring bar mi ldog par blo brtan pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2890: lkug pa gti mug can gyis brtul zhugs nyams su
NK090(u)007:2891: len pa na ngag smra ba spang zhing gnyis chos
NK090(u)007:2892: zhen pa mtha' dag ro mnyam du mnyam par bzhag
NK090(u)007:2893: pas bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab mthar phyin par
NK090(u)007:2894: spyod pa'o // ri rab kyi brtul zhugs bla ma
NK090(u)007:2895: dang mched grogs la dad gus mi 'gyur ba dang
NK090(u)007:2896: spyod pa'o // / ting nge 'dzin bying rgod kyi
NK090(u)007:2897: dbang du mi gtong bar bying rgod kyi gnyen po
NK090(u)007:2899: nam mkha'i brtul zhugs rnal 'byor pa mched lcam gyi nang blo khog shong yangs pa /
NK090(u)007:2901: theg pa gang yang bdag nyid chen po'i lta spyod
NK090(u)007:2902: 'di'i nang du mi shong ba med par lha sgom
NK090(u)007:2903: gzhan la 'gram chu mi ldang bar lam rang gi
NK090(u)007:2904: ngo bo bskyed rdzogs gnyis la spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2905: gnam lcags lce yi brtul zhugs rnal 'byor pas khro
NK090(u)007:2906: bo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pas dgra bgegs
NK090(u)007:2907: gang yang cham la dbab pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2908: lag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis /
NK090(u)007:2909: lha sgom pa dang sngags bzla ba ting nge 'dzin sgom pas /
NK090(u)007:2910: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum lha ye shes pa'i
NK090(u)007:2911: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyi mthu stobs dang
NK090(u)007:2913: bya rog gi brtul zhugs dgra zan gnyis mig gis
NK090(u)007:2914: dus gcig la srung ba ltar spang blang gi gnas
NK090(u)007:2915: la blang dor ma 'chol bar spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2916: glang chen chur 'jug gi brtul zhugs kyis /
NK090(u)007:2917: bdag nyid chen po'i lta spyod kyi gdeng gi nga rgyal la gnas pas /
NK090(u)007:2918: phrin las bzhi'i gdul bya 'dam ga med par spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2919: seng ge'i brtul zhugs kyis rang dang lta spyod mi
NK090(u)007:2920: mthun pa'i grogs ngan spang nas dben par rang nyid
NK090(u)007:2922: sngags kyi spyod pa skyong ba'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2923: reg 'jam bya'i brtul zhugs ngang pa pho mo mi 'bral bar 'grogs pa ltar /
NK090(u)007:2924: rtsa thig rlung gsum las su rung ba'o //
NK090(u)007:2925: rnal 'byor pas nye rgyu'i lam la spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2926: sgyu ma'i brtul zhugs kyis sprul bsgyur sna tshogs pas
NK090(u)007:2927: gdul bya rnams yang dag pa'i lam du khrid pa'i
NK090(u)007:2930: gang 'dod rdzas kyi gzugs byas nas //
