NK090(u)007:2931: rnam par 'phrul pa sgrub par bya //
NK090(u)007:2933: she'u re'u mi na ya a mo kha a 'gus pa 'gus /
NK090(u)007:2934: bya ba'i sngags kyis sgyu ma'i spyod pa gcig kyang gsung snang /
NK090(u)007:2935: phag gi brtul zhugs kyis 'dod yon thams cad bdud
NK090(u)007:2936: rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du bltas nas blang dor med
NK090(u)007:2937: par bde stong gi rtsis zin par spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2938: lce spyang gi brtul zhugs kyis /
NK090(u)007:2939: ting nge 'dzin rdzogs pa'i rim pa mtshan mo gsal bar sgom pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2940: 'di la gsod pa'i brtul zhugs log rtog can thabs
NK090(u)007:2941: kyis bsgral nas rnam shes zag med kyi sa la
NK090(u)007:2942: 'god pa'i tshe lung khrus lung gnas lung gsum dang
NK090(u)007:2944: glog gi brtul zhugs kyis rnal 'byor pas rang don
NK090(u)007:2945: myur du 'grub cing gzhan don du thugs rjes 'byung
NK090(u)007:2946: bar brtson pa shugs gyur pa'i brtson 'grus kyi tshom
NK090(u)007:2947: bu tshogs kyi sgrub pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2948: bya rgod kyi brtul zhugs kyis kho sha la spyod kyang srog mi gcod pa ltar /
NK090(u)007:2949: gong gi sgrol ba'i brtul zhugs rnams dgos pa khyad
NK090(u)007:2950: par can yod na ma gtogs rang dgar drag po'i
NK090(u)007:2951: las mi brtsam pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK090(u)007:2952: de dag gis la dor ba spyod pa'i rim pa bstan zin to //
NK090(u)007:2953: da ni rtsa ba'i drug pa don man ngag gis sgrub pa ston te /
NK090(u)007:2954: de yang lam gyi ngo bo ni /
NK090(u)007:2955: bskyed rdzogs gnyis las rdzogs pa'i rim pa ma h+aa yan chad kyi ngang sgom gsum yin kyang /
NK090(u)007:2957: 'gyur ba ma nges pa'i sa nas bzung rdzogs pa
NK090(u)007:2958: spyir chib bar gyi sa lam dang rgyu 'bras 'brel
NK090(u)007:2960: de lta na yang lam rang gi bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi /
NK090(u)007:2961: bskyed rim gyis tshogs lam dang /
NK090(u)007:2962: rdzogs rim gyis sbyor lam nas rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa'i bar rdzogs dgos pas /
NK090(u)007:2963: rtsal chen rdzogs pa rgyun las /
NK090(u)007:2964: mi slob pa'i rtsis 'gos bsdus kyang /
NK090(u)007:2965: lo chen gyis mthar lam par bzhag pa 'di sgyu
NK090(u)007:2966: 'phrul gyi lhun grub rig 'dzin mthar lam par 'jog
NK090(u)007:2967: pa'i 'gros mdzad par snang bas de ltar nges par
NK090(u)007:2968: byas nas / da ni lam ngang sgom gyi man
NK090(u)007:2969: ngag gis lha mi'i theg pa nas phyi rgyud gsum
NK090(u)007:2970: man chad 'di ting nge 'dzin sgom pa'i yan lag
NK090(u)007:2971: gi tshul gyis lam 'dir don dam nges pa'i theg
NK090(u)007:2972: pas rim gyis blo sbyang ba'i dbang du byas nas
NK090(u)007:2974: dang po lha mi'i theg pa'i lam khyer bzhi /
NK090(u)007:2975: 'gags drug /gdams ngag ngang sgom gyi khrid dang gsum
NK090(u)007:2976: gyis rtsis 'gos bsdus te rgyas par gsungs pa rnams
NK090(u)007:2977: logs su bskol ba 'jam mgon blo gros mtha' yas
NK090(u)007:2978: gsung gdams ngag mdzod du bzhugs pa las nges par
NK090(u)007:2979: byas nas / 'dir ni ngang sgom rnams 'chad pa skabs su babs pas /
NK090(u)007:2980: sgo 'byed phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa btang ba dang lhan cig tu /
NK090(u)007:2981: lha mi'i theg pa'i ngang sgom phyi rgyud gsum yan chad kyi ngang sgom rnams bsgom /
NK090(u)007:2982: gang zhig mdo'i yan lag gi dkyil 'khor drug la
NK090(u)007:2983: bsnyen pa btang bar spro na dkyil 'khor re re
NK090(u)007:2984: la bsnyen pa btang ba dang lhan cig rang rang
NK090(u)007:2985: gi ngang bsgom drug po re re sbyar nas bsgom
NK090(u)007:2986: na shin tu legs pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ro
NK090(u)007:2987: // dngos gzhi sgrub thabs dngos grub char 'bebs kyi
NK090(u)007:2988: bsnyen pa btang ba'i dus kyi phyed man chad nas
NK090(u)007:2989: mtshan mo'i thun gnyis po la nang rgyud gsum gyi
NK090(u)007:2990: ngang sgom rnams sgom na 'jug pa bde ba dang
NK090(u)007:2991: // / bskyed rdzogs 'brel che bas de bzhin nges par byas nas /
NK090(u)007:2992: dang po'i lha mi'i theg pa'i ngang sgom ni /
NK090(u)007:2993: rang gi spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang
NK090(u)007:2994: ba'i steng na bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa rtag
NK090(u)007:2996: de nyid yang dang yang du gsal gdab cing rjes
NK090(u)007:2997: su dran pa'i sgo nas rang gi bya byed kyi
NK090(u)007:2998: blang dor thams cad des bstan pa'i bka' las mi
NK090(u)007:3000: zhes dran pa dang shes bzhin gyi gnyen por 'jog go //
NK090(u)007:3001: de nas sems can thams cad bde ba tshad med
NK090(u)007:3002: pa dang ldan par gyur cig snyam du dran pa
NK090(u)007:3003: rtse gcig la mnyam par 'jog pa sogs tshad med
NK090(u)007:3005: de nas ngang sgom chung ngu nas 'byung ba ltar /
NK090(u)007:3006: bsam gtan dang gzugs kyi ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste /
NK090(u)007:3007: 'di ltar 'dod yon gyi nyes dmigs dang bsam gtan
NK090(u)007:3008: gyi phan yon shes par byas nas stan bde ba
NK090(u)007:3009: la lus gnad g.yo med du bcing /
NK090(u)007:3010: dmigs pa'i gnad sems phyir g.yeng ba las nang du
NK090(u)007:3011: blan te dmigs pa la dang por rtse gcig tu
NK090(u)007:3012: 'jog /de nas rnam rtog skyer mi 'jug par dmigs
NK090(u)007:3013: pa de nyid kyi steng du ma bcos par 'jog
NK090(u)007:3014: /de ltar sems gnas pa'i thabs dgu sogs shes par
NK090(u)007:3015: byas nas mnyam par bzhag pas 'dod yon la chags
NK090(u)007:3016: sdang dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig pa
NK090(u)007:3017: dang / lus sems la shin sbyang thob pa'i dga'
NK090(u)007:3018: bde skye zhing 'dod yon phra mos gos ma gos
NK090(u)007:3019: kyi rtog dpyod dang bcas pa ste bsam gtan dang
NK090(u)007:3020: dang / po'o // de nyid brtan nas nang du
NK090(u)007:3021: shes pa rang lugs su bzhag ste bskyang bas sngar
NK090(u)007:3022: gyi rtog dpyod kyi zhen pa nub cing lus sems
NK090(u)007:3023: la dga' bde sngar las lhag par skye ba ni
NK090(u)007:3025: de nas dga' ba la zhen med kyi rnal 'byor
NK090(u)007:3026: bsgom pas lus kyi dga' bde'i zhen pa nub nas
NK090(u)007:3027: sems bde bas g.yo ba med par khyab pa'i ting
NK090(u)007:3028: nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o //
NK090(u)007:3029: de nas sems kyi bde ba la chags zhen med
NK090(u)007:3030: pa'i rnal 'byor btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang
NK090(u)007:3031: / dran pa yongs su dag pa can bsgom pas
NK090(u)007:3032: rlung gis g.yo ba 'gags shing bde ba'i zhen pa
NK090(u)007:3033: nub nas sems gsal ba dwangs pa la rtse gcig
NK090(u)007:3034: tu gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'o //
NK090(u)007:3035: de ltar slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas /
NK090(u)007:3036: tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi //
NK090(u)007:3037: rim pas so sor bdag 'dzin cing //
NK090(u)007:3038: gzung rnams kun la bdag tu rtog /
NK090(u)007:3039: 'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye //
NK090(u)007:3041: de nas bsam gtan bzhi'i 'du shes la yid dbyung
NK090(u)007:3042: nas gzugs med par snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom
NK090(u)007:3043: ste / de la gzugs snang sna tshogs pa 'di dag nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'o //
NK090(u)007:3044: zhes snang med kyi ting nge 'dzin la sems rtse
NK090(u)007:3045: gcig tu bzhag pas snang ba thams cad rim gyis
NK090(u)007:3046: nub nas nam mkha' lta bu'i stong nyid kyi ngang
NK090(u)007:3047: la gnas pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas so //
NK090(u)007:3048: de las 'das nas sems rang gi ngo bo g.yo
NK090(u)007:3049: med du bzhag pas sngar gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK090(u)007:3050: 'du shes de yang nub nas rnam shes gsal rig
NK090(u)007:3051: tsam du mtha' dbus med par gnas pa ni rnam
NK090(u)007:3053: de nas rnam shes kyi ngo bo yang stong nyid dngos med ci yang med pa'o //
NK090(u)007:3054: zhes rtse gcig tu sgom pas rnam shes kyi 'dzin
NK090(u)007:3055: pa'ang rim gyis nub nas gzugs sems kyi mtshan ma
NK090(u)007:3056: cung zad kyang med pa'i ngang la gnas pa ni
NK090(u)007:3058: de las 'das nas chos gang la yang /
NK090(u)007:3059: yod pa dang med pa'i 'dzin pa dor te ci
NK090(u)007:3060: yang yid la mi byed par rtsol med du bzhag
NK090(u)007:3061: pas ci yang med pa'i 'dzin pa las grol nas
NK090(u)007:3062: 'jig rten pa'i mi rtog rab kyi rtse mor phyin
NK090(u)007:3063: pa ni srid rtse'i snyoms 'jug ste /
NK090(u)007:3065: mnyam dang bdag med ma rtogs nas //
NK090(u)007:3066: ming gzhi med par ma shes te //
NK090(u)007:3067: skye mched bzhi la gnas gyur na //
NK090(u)007:3068: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye //
NK090(u)007:3071: 'jig rten dang po bsam gtan bzhi //
NK090(u)007:3072: snyoms 'jug bzhi gol sa dgu ste //
NK090(u)007:3073: zhes pas bsam gzugs brgyad kyi steng du 'dod pa'i khams kyi sa gcig ste /
NK090(u)007:3074: gol sa dgu lam rim du gsungs so //
NK090(u)007:3075: de lta na'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rten du 'gyur ba mi 'gal zhing /
NK090(u)007:3076: khyad par du'ang lam gong ma'i yon tan gyi rten
NK090(u)007:3077: du 'gro ba la bsam gtan bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin
NK090(u)007:3078: sgom pa de nyid la 'bad par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:3079: de la spyir mdo dbang thos pa'i shes rab can la dbang bskur du byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:3080: bsam pa'i shes rab can la bshad par byed pa dang /
NK090(u)007:3081: sgom pa'i shes rab can la khrid du 'debs pa'i
NK090(u)007:3082: phyag bzhes las phyi ma'i dbang du byas pa gong
NK090(u)007:3083: 'og thams cad la go bar bya'o //
NK090(u)007:3084: des lha mi'i theg pa'i ngang sgom song nas /
NK090(u)007:3085: gnyis pa nyan thos gyi theg pa'i ngang sgom ni /
NK090(u)007:3088: thog mar zhi gnas ni tshe 'di dang 'khor ba'i
NK090(u)007:3089: phun tshogs la yid byung ba'i skyo shas kyis 'du
NK090(u)007:3090: 'dzi dang mi dge ba'i sems spangs te /
NK090(u)007:3092: rang gi dpral bar rus pa'i thig le yungs 'bru tsam zhig bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3093: de la shes pa gtad de bzhag pas /
NK090(u)007:3094: thig le de je che je cher 'phel nas snang
NK090(u)007:3095: ba thams cad keng rus su skya khrol gyis song
NK090(u)007:3096: ba la rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag /de las
NK090(u)007:3097: yang tshur bsdus pa'i sbyor bas /
NK090(u)007:3098: rang lus keng rus su dmigs nas sgom ste /
NK090(u)007:3100: keng rus chags bcas thams cad la //
NK090(u)007:3101: rus pa rgya mtsho'i bar du ni //
NK090(u)007:3102: spro zhing sdud pa las dang po //
NK090(u)007:3104: 'di ni las dang po pa'i mi sdug pa sgom tshul te /
NK090(u)007:3105: de la brten nas spro ba sngar bzhin las tshur bsdus na /
NK090(u)007:3106: keng rus rim gyis nub nas /
NK090(u)007:3108: shin tu brtan nas thod phyed kyang bsdus la smin
NK090(u)007:3109: ma gnyis kyi bar du sems 'dzin pa ste de'ang
NK090(u)007:3110: / keng rus nas ni thod phyed bar //
NK090(u)007:3111: btang nas sbyang bar byed par bshad //
NK090(u)007:3112: smin ma'i bar du sems 'dzin pas //
NK090(u)007:3113: yid la byed pa rdzogs pa yin //
NK090(u)007:3115: de ltar mi sdug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chags
NK090(u)007:3116: sdang 'gags nas sems las su rung bar 'gyur nas
NK090(u)007:3118: de nas lhag mthong sgom pa ni /
NK090(u)007:3119: lam lngar byang phyogs so bdun nam /
NK090(u)007:3120: bden bzhi rnam pa bcu drug tu phye nas bsgom pa yin na'ang /
NK090(u)007:3121: 'di lam gong ma'i stegs su gang zag gi bdag
NK090(u)007:3122: med sgom pa'i lta khrid tsam zhig bstan par bya'o
NK090(u)007:3123: // de yang rang lus nyer len gyi phung po
NK090(u)007:3124: lnga po 'di la bdag tu sgro btags nas ngar
NK090(u)007:3125: 'dzin 'jug pas de sun phyung pa'i don du /
NK090(u)007:3126: 'di ltar bsgom ste nga'o zhes rnam par btags pa'i
NK090(u)007:3127: yul la dmigs nas nga'o zhes bya ba brtags na
NK090(u)007:3128: grub pa med de lus rnams rdul phran gyi bar
NK090(u)007:3129: du bshigs shing / sems kyang skad cig gi bar du brtags te rnam par gzhig pa na /
NK090(u)007:3130: lus sems gnyis kyang nga ma yin la /
NK090(u)007:3131: de gnyis kyi tshogs pa'ang ma grub pas ma yin la /
NK090(u)007:3132: de gnyis logs su'am ma dmigs pa'i phyir bdag med
NK090(u)007:3133: par nges pa na de'i ngang la mnyam par bzhag
NK090(u)007:3134: par bya'o // de ltar gtan la phabs te bsgom
NK090(u)007:3135: pas nga'i bdag tu 'dzin pa log pas nga yir
NK090(u)007:3136: 'dzin pa'am bdag gir 'dzin pa log pas nyon mongs
NK090(u)007:3137: pa ldog /de ldog pas las zad par gyur la
NK090(u)007:3138: par bya'o // / las dang nyon mongs pa zad
NK090(u)007:3139: pas skye ba zad par 'gyur bas na rnam par
NK090(u)007:3142: las dang nyon mongs zad las thar //
NK090(u)007:3143: zhes gsungs pas brtson pas 'bad par gyis shig /gnyis pa rang rgyal gyi ngang sgom ni /
NK090(u)007:3144: rang gi spyi bor thig le dmar po dang /
NK090(u)007:3145: de las khru gang tsam gyis mtho bar thig le dkar po zhig bsam /
NK090(u)007:3146: gnyis ka che chung sran ma tsam du sgom /
NK090(u)007:3147: de ltar gsal thebs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:3148: thig le dmar po de la shes pa gtad pas /
NK090(u)007:3149: de je che je cher 'phel nas snang ba thams
NK090(u)007:3150: cad dmar lam gyis song ba la rtse gcig tu
NK090(u)007:3151: mnyam par bzhag /yang thig le dkar po la shes
NK090(u)007:3152: pa gtad pas / de je che je cher 'phel
NK090(u)007:3153: nas snang ba thams cad dkar lam gyis song ba
NK090(u)007:3155: dkar dmar gnyis po de rten 'brel lugs 'byung ldog gi chos su shes par bya /
NK090(u)007:3156: de nas dkar dmar gnyis khrug gis 'dren pa spyi
NK090(u)007:3157: bo nas bab ste snying gar thim pa'i ngang la
NK090(u)007:3158: ma bcos par mnyam pa bzhag go //
NK090(u)007:3159: de brtan nas lta khrid ni lus sems rdul phran
NK090(u)007:3160: dang skad cig ma'i bar du bshigs pa nyan thos
NK090(u)007:3161: ltar las / don du snang ba rdul phran du
NK090(u)007:3162: bsil ba de yang rnam par bshigs pas mtha' med
NK090(u)007:3163: ltar las / du gyur nas / ci yang ma grub pa'i ngang la mnyam par bzhag go //
NK090(u)007:3165: gang zag gi bdag med rtogs pa'i steng du /
NK090(u)007:3166: bzung ba chos kyi bdag med kyang rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
NK090(u)007:3167: gsum pa byang chub sems dpa'i ngang sgom ni /
NK090(u)007:3168: bsam gtan gyi 'dug stangs chos bdun dang ldan pas /
NK090(u)007:3169: rang gi snying dkyil du thig le cog sgong tsam
NK090(u)007:3170: pa 'od kyi rnam pa kha dog gang du yang
NK090(u)007:3173: thig le stong pa skye ba med //
NK090(u)007:3175: thig le de la brtan pa na kha dog gi rnam pa ma 'gags par cir yang snang la /
NK090(u)007:3176: kha dog la brtags pas gang du'ang ma grub pa'i ngang la rtse gcig tu 'jog go //
NK090(u)007:3177: de ltar dpyad cing bsgom pas blo gnas pa na
NK090(u)007:3178: dpe de dang 'dra bar bsgom bya sgom byed kyis
NK090(u)007:3179: mtshon pa'i phyi nang gi snang ba'i dngos po 'di
NK090(u)007:3180: dag rten 'brel tsam du ma 'gags par shar yang
NK090(u)007:3181: / snang tsam nyid nas don la cung zad kyang
NK090(u)007:3182: grub pa med pa rmi lam gyi snang ba lta
NK090(u)007:3183: / bu dang / de ltar nyams su myong mkhan
NK090(u)007:3184: rang sems kyi ngo bo la cer gyis bltas shing
NK090(u)007:3185: / bu dang / btsal ba na / kha dog
NK090(u)007:3186: sogs ci'i ngo bor ma grub pas 'dzin med stong
NK090(u)007:3187: par thag bcad nas yul dngos med stong gzugs dang
NK090(u)007:3188: yul can 'dzin sems skad cig cha med do //
NK090(u)007:3189: zhes myong mkhan gyi gnyen po kho rang gi ngo
NK090(u)007:3190: bo la'ang ce re bltas pas gtad med du sangs
NK090(u)007:3191: shing gzung 'dzin gang du'ang ma grub pa'i stong gsal
NK090(u)007:3192: nam mkha' lta bu'i rig pa smra bsam brjod med
NK090(u)007:3194: de ka'i ngang la bsal bzhag med pa klod pas bdag med gnyis kyi don rtogs par 'gyur la /
NK090(u)007:3195: de ltar mnyam bzhag tu bdag med gnyis rtogs pa
NK090(u)007:3196: de rjes thob tu dran shes kyis bskyang ba ni
NK090(u)007:3197: / snang ba gang shar kyang med pa gsal snang sgyu ma lta bur thag bcad nas /
NK090(u)007:3198: de nyid lha rjes dran gyi sgor dag pa'i snang
NK090(u)007:3199: ba yum sher phyin gyi sku'i rnam par wal gyis
NK090(u)007:3200: gsal btab nas rgyun chags bskyang bar bya ba yin
NK090(u)007:3201: no // phyi ma 'di lam 'di'i sgos chos yin gyi gzhan la sbyar mi dgos so //
NK090(u)007:3203: slob dpon chen po bde ba gsal mdzad kyi bzhed
NK090(u)007:3204: par bya spyod gnyis thun mong gi ngang sgom ni
NK090(u)007:3205: / 'di ltar rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa rang rgyud pas bzhed pa ltar /
NK090(u)007:3206: kun rdzob snang tshod du bden par mi 'jog par
NK090(u)007:3207: 'dir ni btags yod tsam du snang ba de ltar
NK090(u)007:3208: bsgyur nas nyams su len pa ste /
NK090(u)007:3209: blo chung na rnam smin gyi lus 'di dwangs gsal
NK090(u)007:3210: sgrib thogs med pa 'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus su
NK090(u)007:3211: bsam la / blo chen de nyid 'jam dpal dbyangs lta bu'i lha'i sku bsgom mo //
NK090(u)007:3212: dmigs pa'i gzhi de gnyis gang rigs la gsal thebs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:3213: de'i spyi bor yas nas mar thig le dkar dmar
NK090(u)007:3214: mthing gsum brtsegs mar bsam pa la mnyam par bzhag
NK090(u)007:3216: thig le dkar po las 'od zer 'phros /
NK090(u)007:3217: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi sdig sgrib sbyang /
NK090(u)007:3218: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa sku mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'bul /
NK090(u)007:3219: 'od de tshur 'dus nas rang gi spyi bor thim pas /
NK090(u)007:3220: spyi bor 'jam pa'i dbyangs gser btso ma'i mdangs can
NK090(u)007:3221: ral gri dang ut+pala glegs bam gyis mtshan pa 'dzin
NK090(u)007:3222: pa zhig bsgom / yang thig le dmar po las 'od 'phros /
NK090(u)007:3223: sems can thams cad kyi ngag sgrib sbyang 'phags pa'i gsung mchod /
NK090(u)007:3224: tshur 'dus pas rang gi mgrin par spyan ras gzigs
NK090(u)007:3225: dkar po phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis thugs kar thal
NK090(u)007:3226: mo sbyar ba / 'og ma gnyis shel phreng dang pad dkar 'dzin pa zhig bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3227: yang thig le mthing ka las 'od 'phros /
NK090(u)007:3228: sems can thams cad kyi yid sgrib sbyang /
NK090(u)007:3230: tshur 'dus pas rang gi snying gar phyag rdor sngon po rdo rje dang /
NK090(u)007:3231: sdigs mdzub can khros pa'i nyams dang ldan pa zhig bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3232: de ltar lus ngag yid gsum la de bzhin gshegs
NK090(u)007:3233: pa'i sku gsung thugs kyis rgyas btab nas mnyam par
NK090(u)007:3234: 'jog pa ni mtshan bcas kyi rnal 'byor ro //
NK090(u)007:3236: lha'i snang ba de yang mi dmigs par sbyang nas /
NK090(u)007:3237: sems nyid dag pa stong gsal gyi ye shes mtha'
NK090(u)007:3238: bzhi dang bral ba'i ngang la bsal bzhag med pa
NK090(u)007:3241: snang stong rim gyis bsten par byed //
NK090(u)007:3243: bden gnyis res 'jog tu nyams su len pa yin no //
NK090(u)007:3244: de ltar bya spyod gnyis thun mong pas bstan nas /
NK090(u)007:3245: drug pa yo ga'i ngang bsgom ni /
NK090(u)007:3246: rang nyid skad cig gis rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rnam snang gi skur bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3247: de gsal ba dang rang gi snying dkyil du dwangs
NK090(u)007:3248: ma mi shigs pa lnga gdod nas rigs lnga ye
NK090(u)007:3249: shes lnga'i ngo bor gnas pa nyid /
NK090(u)007:3250: rnam pa thig le sran ma tsam 'od lnga'i gong
NK090(u)007:3251: bu can zhig gsal btab ste gsal thebs pa na
NK090(u)007:3252: / rang gi spyi bor thig le dkar po ril ma tsam zhig bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3254: nam mkha'i dkyil nas thig pa shar //
NK090(u)007:3256: thig le dkar po de mar bab nas snying dkyil
NK090(u)007:3257: gyi dwangs ma mi shigs pa'i thig le la khrug
NK090(u)007:3258: gis 'dres te gnyis su med pa'i ngang la bsal
NK090(u)007:3259: bzhag med par bzhag pas ci'i ngo bor yang ma
NK090(u)007:3260: grub pa'i stong gsal du lhag ger 'char te /
NK090(u)007:3261: don dam mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bor nyid do //
NK090(u)007:3262: de'i byin rlabs kyi gang shar gyi snang ba thams
NK090(u)007:3263: cad rigs lnga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du
NK090(u)007:3264: gnas pa ltar lam du khyer bas lha'i rnam par
NK090(u)007:3265: snang ba ni kun rdzob ye shes kyi snang ba
NK090(u)007:3266: ste / de ltar gnyis su med pa'i ngang la
NK090(u)007:3267: blo ma bcos par gnas pa ni dbang gi sgom
NK090(u)007:3268: ste / don yin no // de dag gis sgo
NK090(u)007:3269: 'byed phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa dang 'brel nas
NK090(u)007:3270: bsgom na stabs bde bas de ltar dang /
NK090(u)007:3271: 'dir ni nang rgyud gsum gyi ngang bsgom 'di rnams
NK090(u)007:3272: mdo tshogs chen 'dus pa dngos gzhi'i bsnyen pa btang
NK090(u)007:3273: ba'i skabs su sgom na bskyed rdzogs gnyis shin tu
NK090(u)007:3274: 'brel che zhing lam rang gi ngo bo yin pas
NK090(u)007:3276: bdun pa ngang sgom phyi ma gsum gyi ma h+aa
NK090(u)007:3277: yo ga'i ngang sgom la lha bsgom pa dang man
NK090(u)007:3278: ngag bsgom pa'o // dang po lha bsgom pa'i thabs ni /
NK090(u)007:3279: rgyas par gzhung nas bstan la 'dir rtsa ba'i sa
NK090(u)007:3280: bcad mi stong tsam du lha sgom pa ngang sgom
NK090(u)007:3281: chung ngu ste / 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams
NK090(u)007:3282: cad bdag gi phung khams skye mched du 'du zhing
NK090(u)007:3283: chung ngu ste / / de thams cad lha'i rang bzhin ye nas sangs rgyas so //
NK090(u)007:3284: zhes dar cig mnyam par bzhag /de'i ngang las me tog phog pa'i lha'am /
NK090(u)007:3285: dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo che mchog lta bur gang bsgom kyang rung ste /
NK090(u)007:3286: rang gi bskyed sngags chos nyid kyi rang sgrar grags
NK090(u)007:3287: pa'i rkyen gyis dwangs pa'i mtsho la gzugs brnyan shar
NK090(u)007:3288: ba ltar bkra lam gyis gsal btab nas lha'i snang
NK090(u)007:3289: zhen la yun ring du bslabs /
NK090(u)007:3290: de gsal thebs pa'i 'di rdzogs rim gyi sngon 'gro
NK090(u)007:3291: lus kyi stong rar med du mi rung ba'i yan
NK090(u)007:3292: lag yin no // de gsal brtan du gyur pa na /
NK090(u)007:3293: de'i spyi bor thig le dmar po dang /
NK090(u)007:3294: de las khru gang tsam gyis mtho bar thig le dkar po ste /
NK090(u)007:3295: gnyis ka sran ma tsam 'od 'bar ba zhig bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3296: de gsal ba dang sna bug g.yon nas thig le dmar po sran ma tsam zhig 'phros /
NK090(u)007:3297: spyi bo'i thig le dmar po la phog pas /
NK090(u)007:3298: de las kyang 'od zer mkha' khyab tu 'phros /
NK090(u)007:3299: sangs rgyas mchod cing sems can gyi sdig sgrib sbyang /
NK090(u)007:3300: 'khor 'das kyi snang ba thams cad zhu ba 'od
NK090(u)007:3301: dang 'grogs te tshur 'dus thig le dmar por thim
NK090(u)007:3302: / de yang 'od du zhu ste ltem mer gnas par bsam /
NK090(u)007:3303: yang sna bug g.yas nas 'od kyi thig le dkar
NK090(u)007:3304: po sran ma tsam zhig 'phros te steng gi thig
NK090(u)007:3305: le dkar po la phog pas /
NK090(u)007:3306: de las 'od zer 'phros te don gnyis byas /
NK090(u)007:3307: 'khor 'das zhu ba dang 'grogs te tshur 'dus pa thig le dkar po la thim pas /
NK090(u)007:3309: thig le dkar po dmar po la zhugs pa tshangs
NK090(u)007:3310: bug nas snying gi dkyil du bstim zhing bde stong
NK090(u)007:3311: gnyis med kyi ngang la blo bzhag go //
NK090(u)007:3312: 'di ni bskyed pa dang 'brel ba'i ngang bsgom sems
NK090(u)007:3313: las rung tsam sgrub pa'i thabs las rdzogs rim mtshan
NK090(u)007:3315: de yin na rtsa thig rlung gi gnad la bsnun
NK090(u)007:3316: pa'i thabs gang yang ma gsungs la rdzogs rim yin
NK090(u)007:3317: na rtsa dang rlung gi gnad khyad par bas rlung
NK090(u)007:3319: rlung sems kyis bslad pa dang bral ba'i 'od gsal mngon du bya dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK090(u)007:3320: gnyis pa man ngag bsgom pa la gnyis /
NK090(u)007:3321: dang po dbang dang 'brel ba ma h+aa yo ga
NK090(u)007:3322: dang thun mong pa'i bsgom thabs ni ngang bsgom 'bring
NK090(u)007:3323: po ste / man ngag gab pa mngon 'byin gyi dbang gis /
NK090(u)007:3324: 'og gi 'bru gsum rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'og gi snying po lam khyer ni /
NK090(u)007:3325: rlu nga gi rdzogs rim thun mong ma yin pa yin pas /
NK090(u)007:3326: de sngon du song nas rlung zhugs gnas thim pa gsum gyi rtags rdzogs nges par byas nas /
NK090(u)007:3327: gzod thig le'i rdzogs rim la 'jug na gnad khyad par can yod pas /
NK090(u)007:3329: rlung 'byung 'jug gnas gsum 'bru gsum gyi gdangs su 'char bas /
NK090(u)007:3330: as snang srid thams cad skye med du ngo sprad /
NK090(u)007:3331: h'u gis 'gags med du ngo sprad /
NK090(u)007:3332: gyis gnyis med du ngo sprad /
NK090(u)007:3334: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK090(u)007:3335: sna tshogs yi ge h'u du gnas //
NK090(u)007:3336: rgyal ba yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK090(u)007:3337: phyag rgya yi ge la rdzogs //
NK090(u)007:3338: thams cad yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK090(u)007:3339: ma skyes gsang ba'i yi ge +aah zhes pa de bsgom pa la /
NK090(u)007:3340: 'bru gsum gyi dbyibs la bzla ba dang /
NK090(u)007:3341: kha dog la bzla ba dang /
NK090(u)007:3342: sgra gdangs la bzla ba gsum las /
NK090(u)007:3343: rdzogs rim gyi skabs 'dir sgra gdangs la bzla ba ste /
NK090(u)007:3344: de yang rang gi lus kyi tshad kyi /
NK090(u)007:3345: yi dam gyi skur gsal ba'i dbus drangs por rdo
NK090(u)007:3346: rje nor bu'i rtse nas yar gyi sna rtse bar
NK090(u)007:3347: rtsa gsum dbu ma stong gsal mtshan nyid bzhi dang
NK090(u)007:3349: dang po rlung nang du 'jug pa'i sgra gdangs gyi rang bzhin yar gyi sna rtser nas zhugs /
NK090(u)007:3350: lte bar pad nyi'i gdan la h'u yig yungs 'bru
NK090(u)007:3351: tsam gsal ba la sib kyis thim pa dang mnyam
NK090(u)007:3352: du a'i sgra gdangs su gnas par bsam la gnas
NK090(u)007:3353: pa la cung zad yun bsring /
NK090(u)007:3354: mi thub pa na h'u gi sgra gdangs kyis dbu
NK090(u)007:3355: ma'i nang nas yar brgyud sna rtse nas phyir song
NK090(u)007:3356: bar bsam la rlung phyir bsal /
NK090(u)007:3357: 'di dag gi dus na 'byung 'jug gnas gsum po
NK090(u)007:3358: dbu ma'i nang kho na nas 'byung 'jug byed par
NK090(u)007:3359: bsam pa ni gnad khyad par can yod la /
NK090(u)007:3360: rang bzhin lus kyi khang pa'i nang nas 'byung 'jug
NK090(u)007:3361: byed pa'i rdor bzlas ni rdzogs rim rdo rje'i bzlas
NK090(u)007:3362: pa'i phyogs dang nye ba ma yin no //
NK090(u)007:3363: steng gi rdo rje'i bzlas pa la dmigs pa brtan pa na /
NK090(u)007:3364: 'og gi rdo rje'i bzlas pa la bslab pa ni
NK090(u)007:3365: steng gi rlung h'u gi rnam pas phyir song ba
NK090(u)007:3366: dang mnyam du / 'og gi rlung rdo rje nor
NK090(u)007:3367: bu'i rtse nas gyi sgra gdangs kyis dbu ma'i nang
NK090(u)007:3368: dang mnyam du / nas zhugs / lte ba'i sa
NK090(u)007:3369: bon la thim nas a'i sgra gdangs kyis cung zad
NK090(u)007:3370: gnas nas steng gi rlung gyi sgra gdangs kyis nang
NK090(u)007:3371: du 'jug pa dang mnyam du 'og gi rlung h'u
NK090(u)007:3372: gi sgra gdangs kyi phyir 'byin par dmigs nas goms
NK090(u)007:3373: dang mnyam du / nas zhugs / na / ji
NK090(u)007:3374: zhig na rlung dbu mar zhugs gnas thim pa'i rtags
NK090(u)007:3376: gzod steng 'og gi sgo'i gtum mo'i rnal 'byor du 'jug pa gnad nges pa'o //
NK090(u)007:3377: 'dir ni dkyus bzhin bsgom pa la gnyis las /
NK090(u)007:3379: rang lus stong chen sgribs thogs dang bral ba'i gtso
NK090(u)007:3380: bo che mchog tu gsal ba'i sku dbus su rtsa
NK090(u)007:3381: a ba d+hu ti mda' smug 'bring po tsam pa
NK090(u)007:3382: phyi dkar la nang dmar ba dwangs gsal sbubs stong
NK090(u)007:3383: gi rnam pa can drangs thal ler gnas pas /
NK090(u)007:3386: snying ga /lte ba rnams su 'khor lo'i rtsa 'dab dngos su bsgom pa'am /
NK090(u)007:3388: dbu ma bsgom pas de 'khor lo bzhi ka'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir /
NK090(u)007:3389: don la bsgom par 'gyur ba yin /
NK090(u)007:3390: lte 'og sor bzhi'i thad du me'i 'khor lo dang /
NK090(u)007:3391: de'i 'og gshang kha rlung gi 'khor lo rnams kyang gsal btab ste /
NK090(u)007:3392: de yang dbu ma srog shing /
NK090(u)007:3393: rlung dang me'i 'khor lo gnyis khri 'phang /
NK090(u)007:3397: spyi bo'i 'khor lo gdugs te lus mchod rten gyi ngo bor mos par bya /
NK090(u)007:3398: de nas spyi bor mi shigs pa'i thig le'i rang
NK090(u)007:3399: bzhin sran ma tsam zhig gsal btab la 'jam rlung
NK090(u)007:3401: ci zhig na gtum mo 'bar ba'i 'od gyen du song ba spyi bo'i thig le la phog pas /
NK090(u)007:3402: de las 'od zer mkha' khyab tu 'phros /
NK090(u)007:3403: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs /
NK090(u)007:3404: 'khor 'das kyi snang ba thams cad zhu nas tshur 'dus te spyi bo'i thig le la thim /
NK090(u)007:3406: rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma'i sku bde ba'i nyams
NK090(u)007:3407: rgyas shing gzi byin 'bar bar gyur pa mchod rten
NK090(u)007:3408: gyi tog gi tshul du bzhugs par bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3409: de la sems yun ring du bzung bas bla ma
NK090(u)007:3410: yang bde ba chen po'i ngo bor ltem gyis zhu
NK090(u)007:3411: ba tshangs bug nas bab ste snying gar sib kyis
NK090(u)007:3412: thim / bla ma'i thugs dang rang sems ro gcig
NK090(u)007:3413: tu 'dres pa'i ngang la ma bcos par bzhag pas
NK090(u)007:3414: snang ba thams cad bde bar 'char ro //
NK090(u)007:3415: gnyis pa 'og sgo'i bde ba sgom thabs ni /
NK090(u)007:3416: rang gi spyi bor thig le dmar po sran ma
NK090(u)007:3417: tsam pa de'i steng gi mda' gang tsam du'ang thig
NK090(u)007:3418: le dkar po sran ma tsam zhig gsal btab la
NK090(u)007:3419: / 'jam rlung bzung zhing spyi bo'i thig le dmar po la shes pa gtad pas /
NK090(u)007:3420: de chags pa'i rang bzhin du 'dar khri li li
NK090(u)007:3421: g.yo zhing 'bar bas rkyen byas te thig le dkar
NK090(u)007:3422: po de yang 'dar bzhin 'od du ltem gyis zhu
NK090(u)007:3423: / thig le dmar por ro gcig tu 'dres /
NK090(u)007:3424: de tshangs bug nas bde hri li li bab pa
NK090(u)007:3425: snying dkyil du thim pa'i ngang la ma bcos par
NK090(u)007:3426: bzhag pas bde stong dbyer med kyi nyams 'char ro
NK090(u)007:3427: // gnyis pa sgrub dbang dang 'brel ba a nu'i ngang sgom ni /
NK090(u)007:3429: rang gi snying gi dkyil du thig le dkar po
NK090(u)007:3430: phug ron gyi sgo nga tsam pa 'od 'bar ba
NK090(u)007:3431: zhig bsgom / de la gsal thebs pa dang /
NK090(u)007:3432: de las 'od kyi thig le dkar mda' 'phangs pa ltar yar spyi gtsug nas thon /
NK090(u)007:3433: de las kyang thig phran phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phros pas /
NK090(u)007:3434: blos 'khyud tshad kyi nam mkha'i khyon gang ba la sems bzung /
NK090(u)007:3435: yang mkha' khyab kyi thig phran rnams tshur 'dus 'phro
NK090(u)007:3436: gzhi'i thig le dang ro gcig tu 'dres pa'i ngang
NK090(u)007:3437: la blta bya lta byed med par bzhag pas /
NK090(u)007:3438: yul dbyings dang yul can rig pa'i ye shes dbyer
NK090(u)007:3439: med pa'i bde ba chen por lhag gis 'char te
NK090(u)007:3440: / de ka'i ngang la 'dzin zhen med par bskyang ba ni gnad dam pa'o //
NK090(u)007:3441: spyi don gsum pa a nu rang lugs kyi ma
NK090(u)007:3442: h+aa dang a nu dang a ti'i ngang sgom gsum
NK090(u)007:3445: dang po kun rdzob byang chub sems dbang dang 'brel ba'i rdzogs rim la /
NK090(u)007:3446: thog mar sgrol ma bzung ba'i man ngag la bslab pa ni /
NK090(u)007:3447: rang nyid yi dam du gsal ba'i sku'i nang stong
NK090(u)007:3448: chen sgrib thogs dang bral ba'i dbus su rtsa dbu
NK090(u)007:3449: ma g.yas g.yon du ro rkyang gnyis yar sna sna
NK090(u)007:3450: bug la zug cing ma sna lte 'og sor bzhi'i
NK090(u)007:3451: thad du dbu mar tshud par mos la /
NK090(u)007:3452: spyi bor bla ma yab yum bsgom la gsol ba btab ste /
NK090(u)007:3453: de nas nad gdon sdig sgrib rnams sangs kyis dag par mos te rlung ro lan gsum bsal /
NK090(u)007:3454: de nas brtan g.yo 'khor 'das kyi dwangs ma thams
NK090(u)007:3455: cad rlung gi rnam par rngubs te lde 'og tu
NK090(u)007:3456: kha sbyar la steng rlung mnan 'og rlung cung zad
NK090(u)007:3457: bskum / 'og rlung steng du 'then che na de
NK090(u)007:3458: gyen du log nas nad bskyed pas tshod zin par
NK090(u)007:3459: bskum / bya / de ltar bum pa can la goms yang mi thub pa na phyir 'phang /
NK090(u)007:3460: yang de ltar bsgom pas rlung dbu ma'i nang du
NK090(u)007:3461: zhugs nas gsal bde mi rtog pa'i nyams skye ba
NK090(u)007:3462: ni rlung gi dgos pa yin pas de ltar sbyar
NK090(u)007:3464: rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad pa'i 'di'i man ngag las /
NK090(u)007:3465: rten pa'i sgron ma zin na rig pa'i phur bu
NK090(u)007:3466: thebs pas mi dmigs par yang 'gyur la des nyi
NK090(u)007:3469: gnyis pa bde ba thig le'i man ngag la gnyis las /
NK090(u)007:3470: dang po steng sgo 'ju 'dul gyi man ngag ni /
NK090(u)007:3472: spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga lte ba'i 'khor lo bzhi dang /
NK090(u)007:3473: lte 'og tu me 'khor gyi dbus su me'i dwangs ma ram yig 'bar ba /
NK090(u)007:3475: spyi bo'i ha yig dkar po bde ba'i rang bzhin can bsgom /
NK090(u)007:3476: de nas rlung bum pa can sngar ltar bzung bas /
NK090(u)007:3477: steng rlung ro rkyang la brgyud de 'ong ba dang /
NK090(u)007:3478: gshang kha'i rlung dkyil g.yos pa gnyis me dkyil gyi ram la phog pas me lce tsha ba /
NK090(u)007:3480: phra zhing gsal ba dbu ma'i nang nas 'bar bas
NK090(u)007:3481: ham la reg /spyi bo'i bla ma bde drod kyis
NK090(u)007:3482: mchod / dgyes pa chen pos bdud rtsir zhu ba ham la thim /
NK090(u)007:3483: ham las byang sems dwangs gsal bde ba'i rang bzhin
NK090(u)007:3484: can phra mo ba thag ltar bab pa ram la
NK090(u)007:3485: thim pas me'i gsos byas te ches cher 'bar bas
NK090(u)007:3486: zla ba bdud rtsir zhu ba'i dwangs mas lus kyi
NK090(u)007:3487: dbu ma'i nang kun gang ba'i 'bar 'dzag la sems
NK090(u)007:3489: dbu ma dang byang sems zhu ba'i reg pas lus bde ba chen por ngang gis 'char ro //
NK090(u)007:3490: 'di gong 'og gi zhib cha kho bos byas pa'i gtum mo'i rnam bshad las shes par bya'o //
NK090(u)007:3491: gnyis pa 'og sgo khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag ni /
NK090(u)007:3493: rigs 'dus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas lngar rigs lnga dang /
NK090(u)007:3494: yan lag bzhi la sgo ba bzhi /
NK090(u)007:3495: dngos rig gam ye shes kyi phyag rgya gang yin kyang rung ste /
NK090(u)007:3497: rdo rje dbyings phyug mar gsal ba'i gnas lngar yum lnga /
NK090(u)007:3498: lag pa gnyis zhal dang b+ha ga rnams su gsang ba'i yum bzhi /
NK090(u)007:3499: mkha' gsang h'u las rdo rje 'bru gsum dang a
NK090(u)007:3500: las pad+ma ze'u 'brur h+r+aihs mtshan par byin gyis brlabs
NK090(u)007:3501: / yum gyi pad+ma'i dbus su he ru ka dgu'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la /
NK090(u)007:3502: de nas rjes chags kyi spyod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK090(u)007:3503: rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam pa sbyor te snyoms 'jug
NK090(u)007:3504: gi sgras bkugs pa'i mkha' khyab kyi sangs rgyas thams
NK090(u)007:3505: cad 'dod chags chen pos zhu ba bdag nyid rig
NK090(u)007:3507: rjes chags kyi mes dkar cha zhu ba'i byang sems
NK090(u)007:3508: rim par babs pas mgrin pa la sogs pa'i gnas
NK090(u)007:3509: bzhir dga' ba bzhi ngang gis skye bar 'gyur la
NK090(u)007:3510: / de yang byang sems rdo rje nor bur 'ong
NK090(u)007:3511: ba na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor mchod nas 'dzag med du
NK090(u)007:3512: bzung bas dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes
NK090(u)007:3513: shar ba la mnyam par bzhag /slar h'u 'dun drag
NK090(u)007:3514: po dang 'gyur bzhi la sogs pas nyi zla gnyis
NK090(u)007:3515: 'dres gyen du drangs pas lte ba la sogs par
NK090(u)007:3516: mas brtan gyi dga' ba bzhi'i tha ma spyi bor
NK090(u)007:3517: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyams su
NK090(u)007:3518: myong zhing mthar yang gcud cing sprugs pas khyab par
NK090(u)007:3519: / dgram mo // bde ba thig le'i skabs 'dir
NK090(u)007:3520: lhan cig skyes pa'i rim pa la thabs lam rang
NK090(u)007:3521: gi sems bcu skabs bcu dpe rtags dang sbyar nas
NK090(u)007:3522: 'bras bu la bgrod tshul spyi mdo'i ljon shing gi
NK090(u)007:3524: gnyis pa don dam byang sems kyi dbang dang 'brel ba'i rdzogs rim la rten can dang /
NK090(u)007:3526: dang po rten can la man ngag lugs gsum ste /
NK090(u)007:3527: glan rdo rje 'od kyi phyag bzhes 'gos kyi yi
NK090(u)007:3528: ger dbang gi dmigs pa bshad ma thag pa ltar
NK090(u)007:3529: snying gar pad 'dab bcu drug la bkod pa'i a
NK090(u)007:3530: yig bco brgyad po rim gyis bsdus te /
NK090(u)007:3531: bde gsal rtsis gdab med pa'i ngang la 'jog pa gcig dang /
NK090(u)007:3532: zur ham gyi phyag bzhes gnyal ba'i yi ger snying
NK090(u)007:3533: gar gzhi'i thig le dkar po lnga tshogs su bsgom
NK090(u)007:3535: gzhan de las 'od kyi thig phra spro bsdu sogs
NK090(u)007:3536: sngar sgrub dbang 'brel ba la u nu'i ngang bsgom
NK090(u)007:3537: du bshad pa ci bzhin mdzad pa dang gnyis /
NK090(u)007:3538: slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i man ngag las snying
NK090(u)007:3539: ga'i mi shigs pa'i thig le la brten nas 'od
NK090(u)007:3540: gsal lhan cig skyes pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba
NK090(u)007:3541: chen po sgrub pa dang gsum las /
NK090(u)007:3542: 'dir phyi ma ltar bsgom pa la lus gnad dang lta stangs mi g.yo bar bcings la /
NK090(u)007:3543: rang gi snying mchong gur phub pa ltar khong stong
NK090(u)007:3544: gi dbus na rtsa brgyad po pad+ma dkar po 'dab
NK090(u)007:3545: ma brgyad pa'i rnam par gyes pa'i lte ba la
NK090(u)007:3546: rtsa'i dwangs ma shel gyi ba thag lta bu'i nang
NK090(u)007:3547: na / ye shes snying po'i thig le 'od lnga'i
NK090(u)007:3548: gong bu yungs 'bru tsam pa dwangs gsal 'bar ba'i
NK090(u)007:3549: rnam pa can la sems gtad de ma yengs par
NK090(u)007:3550: sa ler mnyam par bzhag pa na rlung sems kyi
NK090(u)007:3551: dwangs ma thams cad der thim pas dbyings dang ye
NK090(u)007:3552: shes gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye
NK090(u)007:3553: shes su 'char zhing des yul dang yul can gyi
NK090(u)007:3554: 'dzin pa zhi ste khams gsum bde ba chen por
NK090(u)007:3556: gnyis pa rten yod kyi man ngag ni /
NK090(u)007:3559: sems dus gsum gyi spros pa thams cad bcad nas
NK090(u)007:3560: sprin med kyi nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag par
NK090(u)007:3561: mi rtog pa'i ngang la bzhag pas gang yang yid
NK090(u)007:3562: la mi byed pa'i stong nyid spros pa dang bral
NK090(u)007:3563: ba ni kun tu bzang mo chos nyid don gyi
NK090(u)007:3564: ye shes te / dbyings skye ba med pa ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK090(u)007:3565: gsal rig rjen ne ba'i snang cha ni kun tu bzang po chos sku gzhi'i ye shes te /
NK090(u)007:3566: ye shes 'gags pa med pa rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK090(u)007:3567: de gnyis dbyer med pa'i rig pa ni /
NK090(u)007:3568: dbyings dang ye shes zung 'jug gnyug pa'i ye shes
NK090(u)007:3569: te sras bde ba chen po rtsa ba byang chub
NK090(u)007:3570: sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyams len nges pa'i gnad
NK090(u)007:3571: do // de ltar spyi mdo las /
NK090(u)007:3572: kyee 'dus pa'i tshogs rgyal ba'i sras rnams rang rang
NK090(u)007:3573: gi de kho na nyid mthong bar 'dod na dkyil
NK090(u)007:3574: 'khor chen po gsum gyi sgo 'ba' zhig nas 'jug
NK090(u)007:3575: par bya'o // de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems
NK090(u)007:3576: kyi dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas 'jug par
NK090(u)007:3577: par bya'o // bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
NK090(u)007:3578: dkyil 'khor chen po gsum dang rang rang gi de
NK090(u)007:3579: kho na nyid so so ma yin tha mi dad
NK090(u)007:3580: do // de yang rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
NK090(u)007:3582: de ltar dus gsum rgyal sras 'jug pa'i sgo //
NK090(u)007:3583: spyi mdo dgongs 'dus rgyud dang gsang sngags gnad //
NK090(u)007:3584: rig 'dzin gong ma'i gsung gi gsang ba la //
NK090(u)007:3585: brten pa'i legs bshad skya reng dang po spros //
NK090(u)007:3586: rang bzo ma yin blun po'i 'ol tshod min //
NK090(u)007:3587: grags dang rnyed 'dod mkhas pa'i nga rgyal min //
NK090(u)007:3588: rdo rje'i gnas la dpyad gsum dag pas yin //
NK090(u)007:3589: dngos grub sgrub la bslu ba yod re snyam //
NK090(u)007:3590: mdo sgyu sems gsum grags pa'i rnga bo ches //
NK090(u)007:3591: sngon dus 'dzin ma'i khyon gyi skal ldan rnams //
NK090(u)007:3592: lam 'dir rig 'dzin 'phags pa'i sa mthor gshegs //
NK090(u)007:3593: lus med mkha' 'gro'i gnas dang mtshungs par grags //
NK090(u)007:3594: da dus snyigs ma'i mngon rtags mthu che bas //
NK090(u)007:3595: mdo sgyu sems gsum mtshan tsam thos par dka' //ltar snang bcos mas rang gzhan mgo 'khor ba //
NK090(u)007:3596: log pa'i lam la nan gyis 'jug mthong nas //
NK090(u)007:3597: mi bzod snying rje chen pos kun bslangs te //
NK090(u)007:3598: rang nyid lam 'dir 'jug pa goms phyir dang //
NK090(u)007:3599: bsod nams ldan pa gzhan la phan pa'i phyir //
NK090(u)007:3600: bsnyen bsgrub bsgom don nyung ngu 'di byas so //
NK090(u)007:3601: legs byas rnam dkar phung po ci mchis pas //
NK090(u)007:3602: snga 'gyur theg pa'i ring lugs ches gsal zhing //
NK090(u)007:3603: bshad sgrub rim gnyis nyi ma'i snang ba yis //
NK090(u)007:3604: sa gsum mi shes mun pa mthar byas te //
NK090(u)007:3605: phan bde'i bkra shis phyogs mthar rgyas pa shog /ces
NK090(u)007:3606: pa'ang yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag skyabs rje si
NK090(u)007:3607: tu rin po che bshad sgrub chos kyi rgya mtshos
NK090(u)007:3608: chos rje dam pa rin po che'i 'dus pa mdo'i
NK090(u)007:3610: snga rabs pa'i gsung rgyun gyi 'dus pa mdo'i rgyud mchan 'grel bcas rgyas par stsal zhing /
NK090(u)007:3611: gdan sa 'dir 'dus pa mdo'i bshad rgyun 'dzugs bzhed
NK090(u)007:3612: kyis 'chad nyan la sman pa'i mdo'i rgyud rang gi
NK090(u)007:3613: rtsa ba ches mang bas spyi don gyi tshul gyis
NK090(u)007:3614: rgyud bshad mang nyung 'tshams pa zhig sgrub dgos par
NK090(u)007:3615: bka' yi gnang ba thob pa dang /
NK090(u)007:3616: slad mar yang dpal yul mchog sprul pad nor rin
NK090(u)007:3617: po ches kyang dpal yul gyi bshad gra'i thog 'dus
NK090(u)007:3618: pa mdo'i 'grel bshad cig phog na shin tu gnad
NK090(u)007:3619: che bas rgyud bshad cig stsol grub par bskul ma
NK090(u)007:3620: gnang ba dang / phyis nas kahthoga phyag tsha sprul
NK090(u)007:3621: sku rin po ches 'dus pa mdo'i rgyun bshad cig
NK090(u)007:3622: gnang ba dang / dang / bsnyen pa btang tshul
NK090(u)007:3623: gtso bo bskyed rim gyi bsgom pa'i gnad slong ba
NK090(u)007:3624: zhig ci nas gal che bar bskul ba dang /
NK090(u)007:3625: go 'jo mchog sprul bshad sgrub rgya mtshos mdo sgyu
NK090(u)007:3626: gnyis kyi mtshams grwa 'jog rgyu'i thugs bzhed kyis snga
NK090(u)007:3627: phyir lan mang du bskul ba mi ldog tsam du
NK090(u)007:3628: dpal kahthoga pa chen po si tu chos kyi rgya
NK090(u)007:3629: mtsho'i bka' 'bangs tha shal ba gnubs chen po'i byin
NK090(u)007:3630: rlabs snying la shar ba rdo rje theg mchog rtsal
NK090(u)007:3631: lam / sh+aakya'i dge slong tshul khrims rgya mtshos rang
NK090(u)007:3632: gnas ljon pa lung gi bsam gtan gyi khang bur
NK090(u)007:3633: sug bris su bstar ba 'dis snga 'gyur mdo sgyu
NK090(u)007:3634: sems gsum gyi bstan pa'i me ro bslangs te phyogs
NK090(u)007:3635: dus kun tu bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i bstan pa
NK090(u)007:3636: rin po che kun nas gsal ba'i rgyur gyur cig
